name: tile-cutter
one_line_profile: Tool to cut images into map tiles using the pyramid model
detailed_description: A utility to cut large images into small tiles based on the pyramid model, supporting Web Mercator and Latitude/Longitude projections for map display.

name: fisheye_lidar_calibration
one_line_profile: Calibration method for fisheye camera and LIDAR coordinate transformation
detailed_description: Implements a method to calibrate the extrinsic parameters and coordinate transformation between a fisheye camera and a LIDAR sensor, useful for multi-sensor fusion.

name: PySUS
one_line_profile: Library to access and analyze Brazilian public health (SUS) data
detailed_description: A Python library designed to download, clean, and analyze openly available datasets from the Brazilian Unified Health System (SUS), facilitating epidemiological research.

name: MapTilesDownloader
one_line_profile: Utility to download map tiles from various providers
detailed_description: A Python-based tool for downloading map tiles from tile servers, useful for creating offline maps or acquiring raster data for analysis.

name: geojson-regions
one_line_profile: Tool to create simplified GeoJSON regions for visualization
detailed_description: A repository and utility for generating simplified GeoJSON region boundaries, optimizing map-based visualizations by reducing data complexity.

name: VoltRon
one_line_profile: Spatial omic analysis toolbox for multi-resolution integration
detailed_description: A spatial omic analysis toolbox designed for multi-resolution and multi-omic integration using image registration techniques, enabling advanced biological spatial analysis.

name: BruTile
one_line_profile: .NET library to access tile services
detailed_description: A generic .NET library for accessing tile services such as OpenStreetMap, MapBox, and others, facilitating the integration of tiled map data into applications.

name: Spatial-Allocator
one_line_profile: Tools for generating spatial surrogates and processing emissions data
detailed_description: A set of geospatial tools (Vector, Raster, Surrogate) developed by CMAS Center for processing and allocating emissions and meteorological data for environmental modeling.

name: Windshaft
one_line_profile: Map tile library for PostGIS and Torque.js
detailed_description: A Node.js map tile library that renders tiles from PostGIS data and supports CartoCSS styling, serving as a backend component for geospatial visualization platforms.

name: CesiumJS
one_line_profile: Open-source JavaScript library for 3D globes and maps
detailed_description: A comprehensive JavaScript library for creating world-class 3D globes and maps with high performance, widely used for geospatial data visualization and analysis in web environments.

name: geostan
one_line_profile: Bayesian spatial analysis library for R
detailed_description: An R package for Bayesian spatial analysis, providing tools for spatial regression, disease mapping, and exploratory spatial data analysis using Stan.

name: terracotta
one_line_profile: Lightweight XYZ tile server for raster data
detailed_description: A versatile tile server built with Flask and Rasterio that serves raster data as XYZ tiles, enabling easy visualization of scientific datasets in web maps.

name: Building-Regulariser
one_line_profile: Library for cleaning and regularising building footprints
detailed_description: A Python library designed to clean and regularize building footprint polygons in geospatial data, aligning edges and simplifying geometries for better analysis accuracy.

name: OmniCloudMask
one_line_profile: Cloud and cloud shadow segmentation for satellite imagery
detailed_description: A Python library for fast and accurate segmentation of clouds and cloud shadows in satellite imagery, essential for preprocessing remote sensing data.

name: H3-Pandas
one_line_profile: Integration of H3 spatial indexing with GeoPandas
detailed_description: A library that integrates Uber's H3 hexagonal hierarchical spatial indexing system with Pandas and GeoPandas, facilitating efficient spatial data handling and analysis.

name: Tools_for_ArcGIS_Pro
one_line_profile: Collection of Python tools and samples for ArcGIS Pro
detailed_description: A repository containing Python code samples and custom toolboxes for ArcGIS Pro, providing reusable scripts for various GIS tasks.

name: PointCloudRasterizers.jl
one_line_profile: Julia library to process LiDAR scans into raster images
detailed_description: A Julia package developed by Deltares for processing airborne laser scan (LiDAR) point clouds into raster images, supporting efficient geospatial data conversion.

name: geojson-rbush
one_line_profile: GeoJSON implementation of RBush spatial index
detailed_description: A high-performance JavaScript library implementing RBush (R-tree based spatial index) specifically for GeoJSON data, enabling fast spatial queries.

name: SSGP-toolbox
one_line_profile: Toolbox for filling gaps in spatial datasets
detailed_description: Simple Spatial Gapfilling Processor (SSGP) is a toolbox designed to fill gaps in spatial datasets, such as remote sensing imagery, improving data completeness for analysis.

name: RVGP
one_line_profile: Generalised Gaussian process method for learning vector fields over non-Euclidean domains
detailed_description: A Python implementation of a generalised Gaussian process method designed to learn vector fields on non-Euclidean domains, such as cortical surfaces in EEG data analysis. It allows for the regularization of vector fields using global structural information.

name: eodal
one_line_profile: Earth Observation Data Analysis Library
detailed_description: A Python library designed for the analysis of Earth Observation (EO) data, providing tools for handling and processing satellite imagery and related geospatial datasets.

name: clj-gdal
one_line_profile: Clojure-idiomatic GDAL wrapper
detailed_description: A Clojure wrapper for the GDAL library, enabling geospatial data abstraction and processing within the Clojure programming environment. Developed by Element84, a key player in geospatial software.

name: GIS-Tools-By-Electron
one_line_profile: Desktop 3D GIS toolbox built with Electron
detailed_description: A desktop application providing a suite of 3D GIS tools, built using the Electron framework. It offers functionalities for visualizing and processing geospatial data in a 3D environment.

name: geojson-utils
one_line_profile: Utilities for converting between GeoJSON and other JSON formats
detailed_description: A JavaScript library providing utilities to convert between standard GeoJSON and other JSON-based geospatial formats (like ArcGIS JSON), facilitating data interoperability in web mapping and GIS applications.

name: geometry-api-java
one_line_profile: Esri Geometry API for Java for spatial data analysis
detailed_description: A Java API enabling developers to write custom applications for the analysis of spatial data. It is used in Esri GIS Tools for Hadoop and other third-party data processing solutions for geometric operations.

name: gis-tools-for-hadoop
one_line_profile: GIS tools for spatial analysis of big data on Hadoop
detailed_description: A collection of GIS tools designed to enable spatial analysis of big data within the Hadoop ecosystem, bridging the gap between traditional GIS and big data processing frameworks.

name: raster-deep-learning
one_line_profile: ArcGIS Python raster functions for deep learning
detailed_description: A set of built-in Python raster functions for ArcGIS designed to facilitate deep learning workflows on raster data, enabling tasks such as image classification and object detection.

name: raster-functions
one_line_profile: Lightweight tools for on-the-fly image processing and raster analysis
detailed_description: A curated set of Python-based tools for performing on-the-fly image processing and raster analysis within the ArcGIS environment, supporting various remote sensing tasks.

name: spatial-framework-for-hadoop
one_line_profile: Framework for spatial data analysis on Hadoop
detailed_description: A framework that allows developers and data scientists to leverage the Hadoop data processing system for spatial data analysis, providing necessary types and functions for Hive and other Hadoop components.

name: ArcGIS-Sentinel2-Download-Tools
one_line_profile: Toolbox for Search & Download of Sentinel-2 data
detailed_description: An ArcGIS Python Toolbox designed to search and download Sentinel-2 satellite data (L1C/TOA, L2A/BOA) via the Copernicus Open Access Hub (DHuS) or CODE-DE.

name: WKTPlot
one_line_profile: Visualization library for well-known-text strings and shapely geometries
detailed_description: A Python library for visualizing Well-Known Text (WKT) strings and Shapely geometries. It serves as a utility for debugging and inspecting geometric data in geospatial workflows.

name: ArcGIS2Mapbox
one_line_profile: Tool to transfer shapefiles to Mapbox using tippecanoe
detailed_description: A Python utility to facilitate the transfer of geospatial data from Shapefile format to Mapbox, utilizing tippecanoe for vector tile generation. Developed by GISupportICRC.

name: GMT.jl
one_line_profile: Generic Mapping Tools Library Wrapper for Julia
detailed_description: A Julia wrapper for the Generic Mapping Tools (GMT), a widely used open-source collection of tools for manipulating geographic and Cartesian data sets and producing high-quality illustrations.

name: RemoteS.jl
one_line_profile: Remote sensing data processing library for Julia
detailed_description: A Julia library dedicated to remote sensing data processing, providing functionalities for handling and analyzing satellite imagery and related geospatial data.

name: GeoDa
one_line_profile: Software for spatial data analysis and visualization
detailed_description: A free and open-source software tool that serves as an introduction to spatial data analysis. It provides a user-friendly interface for exploratory spatial data analysis (ESDA) and spatial modeling.

name: rgeoda
one_line_profile: R library for spatial data analysis based on libgeoda
detailed_description: An R package that provides spatial data analysis functionalities based on the libgeoda library, bringing GeoDa's spatial statistics capabilities to the R environment.

name: geoblaze
one_line_profile: Blazing Fast JavaScript Raster Processing Engine
detailed_description: A JavaScript library for performing raster analysis in the browser or Node.js. It allows for arithmetic, statistics, and other processing operations on raster data (like GeoTIFFs) without a backend.

name: geotiff.io
one_line_profile: Platform for viewing and analyzing GeoTIFFs in the browser
detailed_description: A web-based tool (and source code) for visualizing and performing lightweight analysis on GeoTIFF files directly in the browser, leveraging client-side processing capabilities.

name: GeoWebCache
one_line_profile: Java-based tile caching server for GIS services
detailed_description: A tile caching server implemented in Java that accelerates the delivery of map tiles from WMS services. It supports various protocols like WMS-C, TMS, and WMTS, acting as a critical infrastructure component for geospatial data serving.

name: mapbox-3dtiles
one_line_profile: 3D Tiles implementation using Mapbox GL JS
detailed_description: A library that enables the rendering of OGC 3D Tiles within Mapbox GL JS applications, extending Mapbox's capabilities to support standard 3D geospatial data formats.

name: PyRate
one_line_profile: Tool for estimating velocity and time-series from InSAR data
detailed_description: A Python tool developed by Geoscience Australia for processing Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) data to estimate ground displacement velocity and time-series.

name: dea-cogger
one_line_profile: Convert NetCDFs to Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs
detailed_description: A utility from Geoscience Australia to convert NetCDF files into Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COG), facilitating efficient cloud-based geospatial data access and processing.

name: giswater
one_line_profile: Software for water cycle management using open source tools
detailed_description: Open-source software focused on the management of the water cycle (water supply, sewerage, drainage) integrating with GIS tools like QGIS and PostgreSQL/PostGIS.

name: geoutils
one_line_profile: Analysis of georeferenced rasters, vectors and point clouds
detailed_description: A Python library for handling and analyzing georeferenced data (rasters, vectors, point clouds), designed to simplify common geospatial operations in scientific workflows, particularly in glaciology.

name: Gogeo
one_line_profile: Rapid spatial analysis of large-scale vector data in Go
detailed_description: A Go-based library designed for high-concurrency spatial analysis of large-scale vector data, leveraging the GDAL library for underlying geospatial operations.

name: pRPL
one_line_profile: Parallel Raster Processing Library
detailed_description: An MPI-enabled C++ library that provides interfaces to parallelize raster and image processing algorithms, designed for high-performance spatial computing.

name: digital-elevation-model
one_line_profile: Tools to transform, project, visualize, and read Digital Elevation Models
detailed_description: A Python toolkit for processing Digital Elevation Models (DEMs), including functions for transformation, projection, visualization, and reading formats like ASTERGDEM and EUDEM.

name: odeon
one_line_profile: Task-agnostic framework for deep learning applied to remote sensing
detailed_description: A deep learning framework developed by IGN (French National Geographic Institute) specifically for remote sensing applications, designed to be task-agnostic and flexible.

name: ITK-Wasm
one_line_profile: High performance spatial analysis in a web browser using ITK
detailed_description: A framework bringing the Insight Toolkit (ITK) to the web via WebAssembly, enabling high-performance spatial and medical image analysis directly in the browser and across languages.

name: flight_planner
one_line_profile: QGIS plugin for planning photogrammetric flights
detailed_description: A QGIS plugin designed to assist in planning photogrammetric flights, calculating parameters like projection centers, image coverage, and GSD maps.

name: Geographical-Gaussian-Process-Regression
one_line_profile: Geographical Gaussian Process Regression (GGPR) model for spatial prediction
detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Geographical Gaussian Process Regression (GGPR) model, designed for spatial prediction and exploratory spatial data analysis in geographical sciences.

name: GDAL.jl
one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the GDAL geospatial library
detailed_description: A thin Julia wrapper for the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL), enabling reading and writing of raster and vector geospatial data formats within the Julia ecosystem.

name: GeoJSON.jl
one_line_profile: GeoJSON data handling utilities for Julia
detailed_description: A Julia package providing utilities for parsing, generating, and working with GeoJSON data, facilitating integration of web-standard geospatial data into scientific workflows.

name: CoordinateTransformations.jl
one_line_profile: Coordinate transformation library for Julia
detailed_description: A Julia library for performing coordinate transformations, essential for geometry processing and spatial data alignment in scientific computing.

name: RasterSmith
one_line_profile: Preprocessing tool for NASA Earth observing satellite data
detailed_description: A Python package to preprocess various NASA Earth observing satellite data products into common resolutions, spatial references, and formats to facilitate cross-sensor analysis.

name: index-cpp
one_line_profile: C++ spatial indexing implementations including Hilbert-curve geohash
detailed_description: C++ implementations of efficient indexing mechanisms, specifically featuring a Hilbert-curve geohash based spatial index, suitable for high-performance spatial data retrieval.

name: lftools
one_line_profile: Tools for cartography, surveying, and spatial analysis
detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for cartographic production, surveying tasks, digital image processing, and general spatial analysis.

name: PhaseWare
one_line_profile: Phase map retrieval for fringe projection profilometry
detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for phase map retrieval in fringe projection profilometry and off-axis digital holographic interferometry, used in optical metrology and imaging.

name: iCGIS
one_line_profile: Lightweight GIS desktop application
detailed_description: A simple Geographic Information System (GIS) program built with Qt, OpenGL, and GDAL, providing visualization and basic processing capabilities for geospatial data.

name: RSMI
one_line_profile: Recursive Spatial Model Index implementation
detailed_description: Implementation of a Recursive Spatial Model Index, a learned spatial index structure for efficient spatial query processing.

name: nichecompass
one_line_profile: End-to-end analysis of spatial multi-omics data
detailed_description: A Python package for the end-to-end analysis of spatial multi-omics data, enabling the study of cellular niches and spatial organization in biological tissues.

name: plateau-gis-converter
one_line_profile: Converter for PLATEAU 3D city models to geospatial formats
detailed_description: A tool for converting PLATEAU's CityGML 3D city models into various geospatial formats such as 3D Tiles, MVT, and GeoPackage for visualization and analysis.

name: Marlu
one_line_profile: Coordinate transformations and Jones matrices for MWA Telescope
detailed_description: A Rust library providing coordinate transformations and Jones matrix calculations specifically for the Murchison Widefield Array (MWA) radio telescope data analysis.

name: kdbush
one_line_profile: Fast static spatial index for 2D points in Go
detailed_description: A Go port of kdbush, providing a very fast static spatial index for 2D points, useful for spatial queries and range searches in geospatial applications.

name: MapServer
one_line_profile: Open source platform for publishing spatial data to the web
detailed_description: A major open-source development environment for building spatially-enabled internet applications, capable of rendering maps and serving geospatial data via OGC standards.

name: gdal.netcore
one_line_profile: GDAL bindings for .NET applications
detailed_description: A library providing GDAL 3.x bindings for C# and F#, enabling .NET applications to perform advanced geospatial data processing and format conversion.

name: db-sync
one_line_profile: Synchronization tool for Mergin Maps and PostGIS
detailed_description: A tool designed to facilitate two-way synchronization of geospatial data between the Mergin Maps mobile collection platform and a PostGIS database, supporting field data collection workflows.

name: geodiff
one_line_profile: Library for handling diffs of geospatial data
detailed_description: A library for computing and applying differences (diffs) between geospatial datasets, essential for version control and synchronization of GIS data.

name: horde-ad
one_line_profile: Higher Order Reverse Derivatives Efficiently - AD library
detailed_description: A Haskell library for efficient higher-order reverse-mode automatic differentiation, applicable in scientific modeling, machine learning, and optimization tasks.

name: pyMeteo
one_line_profile: Python library for meteorological data processing
detailed_description: A Python library containing tools and functions for processing, analyzing, and visualizing meteorological and atmospheric science data.

name: POPP
one_line_profile: Palm Oil Plantation Predictor
detailed_description: A Python tool developed by NASA DEVELOP to automate the downloading, atmospheric correction, and processing of raster data to identify potential palm oil plantations.

name: WebWorldWind
one_line_profile: NASA WorldWind Javascript SDK for 3D globes
detailed_description: A JavaScript SDK by NASA for creating geo-browser web applications and embedding 3D virtual globes in web pages, supporting visualization of geospatial data.

name: WorldWindAndroid
one_line_profile: NASA WorldWind Android SDK
detailed_description: The NASA WorldWind Java SDK for Android, enabling the development of 3D virtual globe applications for mobile devices to visualize Earth science data.

name: ocgis
one_line_profile: OpenClimateGIS for CF-compliant climate datasets
detailed_description: A Python package providing geoprocessing and calculation tools specifically designed for CF-compliant climate datasets, facilitating climate data analysis.

name: motif
one_line_profile: Pattern-based spatial analysis in R
detailed_description: An R package for pattern-based spatial analysis, allowing for the description and comparison of spatial patterns in categorical raster data.

name: spData
one_line_profile: Datasets for spatial analysis in R
detailed_description: An R package containing diverse spatial datasets used for teaching and testing spatial analysis methods, serving as a standard data resource.

name: PROJ
one_line_profile: Cartographic Projections and Coordinate Transformations Library
detailed_description: A standard Unix filter function and library for converting geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to another, fundamental to GIS software.

name: GDAL
one_line_profile: Translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats
detailed_description: GDAL is a translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats that presents a single abstract data model to the calling application for all supported formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command-line utilities for data translation and processing.

name: GRASS GIS
one_line_profile: Free and open source geospatial processing engine
detailed_description: GRASS (Geographic Resources Analysis Support System) is a free and open source Geographic Information System (GIS) software suite used for geospatial data management and analysis, image processing, graphics and maps production, spatial modeling, and visualization.

name: libgeotiff
one_line_profile: Library for reading and writing GeoTIFF information tags
detailed_description: Libgeotiff is an open source library built on top of libtiff for reading and writing GeoTIFF information tags. It is a key component in the geospatial software stack for handling raster data metadata.

name: Flex Projector
one_line_profile: Software for creating custom world map projections
detailed_description: Flex Projector is a software tool that allows cartographers and enthusiasts to create custom world map projections. It provides an interactive interface to modify projection parameters and visualize distortions.

name: JMapProjLib
one_line_profile: Java Map Projection Library
detailed_description: JMapProjLib is a Java library for performing map projections. It supports various projection types and is designed for integration into Java-based geospatial applications.

name: Adaptive Composite Map Projections
one_line_profile: Library for creating adaptive composite map projections
detailed_description: This library implements adaptive composite map projections, which combine several projections to minimize distortion across different regions or scales.

name: PDAL
one_line_profile: Point Data Abstraction Library for point cloud processing
detailed_description: PDAL (Point Data Abstraction Library) is a C++ library for translating and manipulating point cloud data. It functions similarly to GDAL but for point cloud data (LiDAR, etc.), offering a pipeline architecture for data processing.

name: Pandas-Bokeh
one_line_profile: Bokeh plotting backend for Pandas and GeoPandas
detailed_description: Pandas-Bokeh provides a Bokeh plotting backend for Pandas, GeoPandas, and Pyspark DataFrames, enabling interactive plotting of geospatial and tabular data directly from DataFrames.

name: esri2gpd
one_line_profile: Scraper to convert ArcGIS Server REST API features to GeoDataFrame
detailed_description: esri2gpd is a Python tool designed to scrape features from the ArcGIS Server REST API and return them as a geopandas GeoDataFrame, facilitating data acquisition from proprietary ESRI services into open science workflows.

name: pyopf
one_line_profile: Python library for working with Open Photogrammetry Format (OPF) projects
detailed_description: pyopf is a Python library and set of tools designed to facilitate working with Pix4D's Open Photogrammetry Format (OPF) projects, enabling programmatic access and manipulation of photogrammetry project data.

name: Projection Wizard
one_line_profile: Map projection selection tool
detailed_description: Projection Wizard is a web-based tool (and underlying logic) that helps cartographers select the most appropriate map projection for their specific map extent and distortion properties.

name: UAVProduct
one_line_profile: UAV image processing pipeline for geometric correction and point cloud generation
detailed_description: UAVProduct is a C++ based tool for processing UAV imagery. It utilizes OpenMVG, OpenMVS, and GDAL to perform tasks such as image geometric correction, image stitching, and point cloud generation.

name: geoplot
one_line_profile: High-level geospatial data visualization library for Python
detailed_description: Geoplot is a high-level Python geospatial plotting library. It is an extension to cartopy and matplotlib which makes mapping easy, providing a high-level interface for creating various types of geospatial visualizations.

name: Rfast
one_line_profile: Collection of fast R functions for data analysis
detailed_description: Rfast is a collection of R functions for data analysis and statistics, implemented in C++ to achieve high performance. It covers a wide range of statistical methods and utility functions.

name: Rfast2
one_line_profile: Complementary collection of fast R functions for data analysis
detailed_description: Rfast2 is a continuation/complement to the Rfast package, providing additional high-performance functions for data analysis and statistics in R.

name: H3NET
one_line_profile: Hexagonal Hierarchical Geo-spatial Indexing System in C#
detailed_description: H3NET is a C# port/implementation of the H3 hexagonal hierarchical geospatial indexing system, allowing for efficient spatial indexing and analysis using hexagonal grids.

name: Stereopy
one_line_profile: Toolkit for spatial transcriptomic analysis
detailed_description: Stereopy is a comprehensive toolkit for spatial transcriptomics analysis. It provides functions for data reading, preprocessing, clustering, and visualization of spatial gene expression data.

name: geopatra
one_line_profile: Interactive Maps with Geopandas
detailed_description: Geopatra is a Python library that wraps Geopandas to provide easy-to-use interactive mapping capabilities, integrating with libraries like Folium and Kepler.gl.

name: YiShape-Math
one_line_profile: Java math library for vector operations, statistics, and ML
detailed_description: YiShape-Math is a Java math library providing NumPy-like functionalities, including vector and matrix operations, statistics, optimization, signal processing, and machine learning models, suitable for scientific computing in Java.

name: Sen2Agri-System
one_line_profile: Sentinel-2 for Agriculture software system
detailed_description: Sen2Agri is a software system designed to process high-resolution satellite images (specifically Sentinel-2 and Landsat 8) for agricultural monitoring purposes, such as crop type mapping and vegetation status monitoring.

name: omicverse
one_line_profile: Python library for multi-omics analysis including bulk, single-cell, and spatial RNA-seq
detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library designed for multi-omics data analysis. It supports bulk RNA-seq, single-cell RNA-seq, and spatial transcriptomics, providing tools for data processing, visualization, and inference in biological research.

name: peridetic
one_line_profile: Precise and fast Geographic/Cartesian coordinate transformations library
detailed_description: A C++ header-only implementation for simple, precise, accurate, and fast coordinate transformations between Geographic and Cartesian systems, suitable for geodesy and GIS applications.

name: TerriaJS
one_line_profile: Library for building rich, web-based geospatial 2D & 3D data platforms
detailed_description: A framework for constructing web-based geospatial catalogs and visualization platforms. It supports both 2D and 3D map views and is used to build national-scale digital twin and data portal applications.

name: OpenAthena-Legacy-Python
one_line_profile: Geodetic location spotting tool for common drones
detailed_description: A tool that allows common drones to identify precise geodetic locations from imagery, useful for photogrammetry and search-and-rescue operations.

name: TileStache
one_line_profile: Map tile caching and serving server
detailed_description: A server application for caching and serving map tiles. It supports various providers and projection systems, facilitating the distribution of geospatial raster and vector data.

name: Fiona
one_line_profile: Python library for reading and writing geographic data files
detailed_description: Fiona is designed to be a simple, clean, and Pythonic interface to the OGR library, focusing on reading and writing vector data formats like Shapefiles and GeoJSON.

name: fio-buffer
one_line_profile: Fiona CLI plugin for buffering geometries
detailed_description: A command-line interface plugin for Fiona that performs geometry buffering operations in parallel using Shapely, enhancing vector data processing workflows.

name: rtree
one_line_profile: Spatial indexing library for Python GIS
detailed_description: A Python wrapper for libspatialindex, providing advanced spatial indexing capabilities (R-Tree) essential for efficient spatial queries and GIS operations.

name: raster_tools
one_line_profile: RMRS Raster Utility Project for geospatial analysis
detailed_description: A collection of raster processing utilities developed by the USDA Forest Service Rocky Mountain Research Station (RMRS) for ecological and geospatial analysis.

name: python-awips
one_line_profile: Framework for querying AWIPS meteorological datasets
detailed_description: A Python framework for interacting with EDEX Data Servers to query and retrieve meteorological data from the Advanced Weather Interactive Processing System (AWIPS).

name: UrbanMapper
one_line_profile: Spatial join and enrichment tool for urban layers
detailed_description: A tool designed to streamline urban analysis by providing spatial join and enrichment capabilities for urban datasets, featuring Scikit-Learn-like pipelines for integration into data science workflows.

name: cog_worker
one_line_profile: Scalable analysis tool for Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs)
detailed_description: A Python tool designed for performing scalable, arbitrary analysis on Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs, enabling efficient processing of large-scale raster datasets in cloud environments.

name: WorldWindExplorer
one_line_profile: 3D virtual globe geo-browser app framework
detailed_description: A web-based 3D virtual globe application framework built on WorldWindJS, allowing for the visualization of terrain, imagery, and celestial data.

name: bento-tools
one_line_profile: Toolkit for subcellular analysis of spatial transcriptomics data
detailed_description: A Python toolkit for analyzing spatial transcriptomics data at the subcellular level, enabling the study of RNA localization and spatial organization within cells.

name: Changen
one_line_profile: Scalable Multi-Temporal Remote Sensing Change Data Generation
detailed_description: A tool for generating synthetic multi-temporal remote sensing change detection datasets by simulating stochastic change processes, useful for training AI models in remote sensing.

name: PyCUDA-Raster
one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated GIS tool for fast raster analysis
detailed_description: An open-source GIS tool that leverages NVIDIA CUDA and PyCUDA to perform high-speed raster analysis and processing.

name: wxee
one_line_profile: Interface between Earth Engine and xarray for time series processing
detailed_description: A Python library that facilitates the processing of time series data by providing a bridge between Google Earth Engine and xarray, enabling efficient data handling and analysis.

name: shapefile

detailed_description: A C# library for reading ESRI Shapefiles, enabling .NET applications to ingest and process standard geospatial vector data.

name: Whitebox.jl
one_line_profile: Julia frontend for WhiteboxTools geospatial analysis engine
detailed_description: A Julia package that serves as a frontend for WhiteboxTools, an advanced geospatial data analysis platform. It allows Julia users to access a wide range of GIS and remote sensing analysis functions provided by the WhiteboxTools backend.

name: fasterRaster

detailed_description: An R package designed to speed up raster processing tasks by leveraging the computational power of GRASS GIS 8.3+ as a backend. It provides a faster alternative to standard R raster libraries for heavy geospatial computations.

name: hybrid-spatial-index

detailed_description: A Java implementation of a hybrid spatial data structure combining Quad Tree, R Tree, and KD Tree. It is designed for efficient insertion, search, and nearest neighbor queries on a 2D plane, suitable for spatial data management.

name: cad-to-shapely

detailed_description: A Python tool that converts DXF CAD files into Shapely geometry objects using ezdxf. This facilitates the integration of engineering CAD data into geospatial analysis pipelines within the Python ecosystem.

name: pyEarth

name: pyGISS

detailed_description: A lightweight Geographic Information System (GIS) implementation in Python. It provides basic functionalities for viewing and interacting with geospatial data, serving as a minimal tool for simple GIS tasks.

name: godal
one_line_profile: Golang wrapper for GDAL
detailed_description: A Go programming language wrapper for the GDAL (Geospatial Data Abstraction Library). It enables Go developers to read, write, and manipulate geospatial raster and vector data using the industry-standard GDAL library.

name: jsi
one_line_profile: Java Spatial Index (RTree implementation)
detailed_description: A Java library implementing the RTree spatial indexing algorithm. It is designed for high-performance spatial queries, such as intersection and nearest neighbor searches, essential for geospatial applications.

name: shapely-geojson
one_line_profile: GeoJSON handling utilities for Shapely
detailed_description: A Python library that provides helper classes and functions to bridge the gap between GeoJSON specifications and Shapely geometries, simplifying the manipulation and serialization of geospatial data.

name: spatial_index
one_line_profile: Spatial indexing algorithms in OCaml
detailed_description: An OCaml implementation of spatial indexing data structures, including R-trees. It provides efficient mechanisms for storing and querying spatial data within the OCaml ecosystem.

name: SpatialIndexing.jl
one_line_profile: Pure Julia spatial indexing library
detailed_description: A Julia library providing pure Julia implementations of spatial indexing structures like R*-trees. It enables efficient spatial queries and data management directly within Julia workflows.

name: h3-indexer
one_line_profile: Geospatial indexing with H3 and PySpark
detailed_description: An open-source package for indexing geospatial data using PySpark, Apache Sedona, and the H3 hierarchical spatial indexing system. It allows for mapping vector geospatial datasets to H3 grids for efficient large-scale analysis.

name: csvToGeoJSON
one_line_profile: CSV to GeoJSON conversion utility
detailed_description: A Python utility for converting CSV data containing geospatial coordinates into GeoJSON format, facilitating data interoperability and visualization in GIS applications.

name: Apache SIS
one_line_profile: Spatial Information System library for Java
detailed_description: A Java library for developing geospatial applications following OGC/ISO standards. It provides data structures and services for spatial referencing, coordinate transformations, and metadata management.

name: ADCPtools
one_line_profile: ADCP data processing and coordinate transformation tools
detailed_description: A MATLAB toolkit for processing Acoustic Doppler Current Profiler (ADCP) data, specifically focusing on beam-to-earth coordinate transformations and other oceanographic data utilities.

name: gdalcubes
one_line_profile: Earth observation data cubes analysis in R
detailed_description: A library for creating and analyzing Earth observation data cubes from satellite imagery collections. It simplifies the processing of large spatiotemporal datasets by abstracting them as regular data cubes.

name: CityEnergyAnalyst
one_line_profile: Urban building energy modeling platform
detailed_description: An open-source urban building energy modeling (UBEM) platform for the design of low-carbon and highly efficient cities. It allows for the analysis of energy demand, supply, and optimization at the district scale.

name: Wicket
one_line_profile: WKT geometry parser and converter
detailed_description: A lightweight JavaScript library for parsing Well-Known Text (WKT) geometry strings and converting them into various framework-specific geometry objects (e.g., Google Maps, Leaflet), facilitating frontend geospatial data handling.

name: loam
one_line_profile: JavaScript wrapper for GDAL to enable geospatial data processing in the browser
detailed_description: A wrapper around GDAL (Geospatial Data Abstraction Library) compiled to WebAssembly, allowing developers to perform raster and vector data processing, projection, and format conversion directly in web browsers without server-side dependencies.

name: Raster Vision
one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for object detection and segmentation on satellite and aerial imagery
detailed_description: An open-source framework that bridges the gap between deep learning ecosystem (PyTorch) and geospatial data. It handles the complex pipeline of chipping large satellite images, training models, and stitching predictions back into georeferenced maps.

name: Starfysh
one_line_profile: Spatial transcriptomic analysis using deep generative modeling
detailed_description: A computational framework for analyzing spatial transcriptomics data. It uses deep generative models to integrate gene expression with histology images to characterize tissue architecture and cell-cell interactions.

name: bcdata_py
one_line_profile: Python interface for accessing British Columbia's DataBC geospatial data
detailed_description: A command-line tool and Python library designed to facilitate the retrieval of geospatial data from the British Columbia government's WFS (Web Feature Service) interface, streamlining data acquisition for regional research.

name: CitySeer API
one_line_profile: Computational tools for urban spatial network analysis and pedestrian simulation
detailed_description: A Python library for urban analysis, focusing on spatial networks, accessibility metrics, and centrality measures. It is designed to assist in urban planning and spatial data science tasks.

name: GISAID Scrapper
one_line_profile: Tool for scraping SARS-CoV-2 data from GISAID
detailed_description: A utility designed to automate the extraction of viral genomic data and metadata from the GISAID database, facilitating epidemiological and phylogenetic research on SARS-CoV-2.

name: cogeotiff
one_line_profile: High-performance Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF (COG) reader
detailed_description: A TypeScript library for reading and processing Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs directly in web environments or Node.js. It enables efficient partial reading of large geospatial raster files stored in cloud storage.

name: GeoDot Plugin
one_line_profile: Godot engine plugin for importing and visualizing geospatial data
detailed_description: A plugin for the Godot game engine that enables the loading and visualization of geospatial datasets (raster and vector). It facilitates the creation of scientific visualizations, digital twins, and simulations within a real-time 3D engine.

name: geofeather
one_line_profile: High-performance file I/O for geospatial dataframes
detailed_description: A Python library that optimizes the reading and writing of GeoPandas dataframes using the Feather file format. It significantly speeds up I/O operations for large vector datasets compared to standard Shapefile or GeoJSON parsers.

name: eegtools
one_line_profile: Python modules for EEG signal analysis and visualization
detailed_description: A collection of tools for processing Electroencephalography (EEG) data, including loaders for EDF+/BDF formats, spatial filters, and scalp plotting functions for neuroscience research.

name: gdal3.js
one_line_profile: Browser-based GDAL wrapper for geospatial data conversion
detailed_description: A JavaScript library that provides GDAL functionalities in the browser via WebAssembly. It allows for the conversion and transformation of raster and vector geospatial data formats without backend infrastructure.

name: city2graph
one_line_profile: Tool to transform road networks into graph representations for GNNs
detailed_description: A Python tool designed to convert geospatial road network data into graph structures suitable for Graph Neural Networks (GNNs). It facilitates the application of deep learning to spatial network analysis and urban transport modeling.

name: s2g
one_line_profile: Shapefile to Graph converter for spatial network analysis
detailed_description: A Python utility that converts GIS Shapefiles (typically road or utility networks) into graph data structures (NetworkX compatible). It handles the topological connection of line strings to form a navigable network.

name: TileCloud
one_line_profile: Utility for generating, managing, and transforming map tiles
detailed_description: A powerful tool for processing map tiles. It supports generation, transformation, storage, and visualization of tiles in various formats (TMS, WMTS, etc.) and backends (S3, disk, MBTiles), essential for serving large geospatial datasets.

name: Data Cube Utilities
one_line_profile: Algorithms and processing functions for CEOS Data Cube raster data
detailed_description: A collection of Python algorithms and utilities developed by the CEOS Systems Engineering Office for analyzing raster data within the Open Data Cube ecosystem. It includes tools for vegetation indices, water detection, and time-series analysis.

name: shapely.js
one_line_profile: JavaScript port of the Shapely Python library for geometric manipulation
detailed_description: A JavaScript library that ports the functionality of the Python Shapely library (based on GEOS) to the browser/Node.js. It enables complex geometric operations (intersection, union, buffer) on geospatial data in JavaScript environments.

name: WGS84toCartesian
one_line_profile: C++ library for WGS84 to Cartesian coordinate transformations
detailed_description: A simple header-only, single-file library to handle WGS84 coordinate to Cartesian coordinate transformations for C++.

name: Maplat
one_line_profile: Historical Map Viewer with nonlinear homeomorphic projection
detailed_description: Maplat is a library and viewer for historical maps that can transform map coordinates with nonlinear but homeomorphic projection, enabling collaboration with GPS/accurate maps without distorting the original artwork.

name: giscat
one_line_profile: Compact and fast Java GIS toolset
detailed_description: giscat is a compact and fast tool set for Java GIS development, providing spatial data processing capabilities.

name: rio-cogeo
one_line_profile: Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF creation and validation plugin for rasterio
detailed_description: A plugin for rasterio that facilitates the creation and validation of Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COG), a key format for cloud-native geospatial workflows.

name: rio-tiler
one_line_profile: Rasterio plugin to read and tile raster datasets
detailed_description: A library to read and create tiles from raster datasets, supporting various projections and cloud-native access patterns.

name: rio-tiler-mosaic
one_line_profile: Plugin for creating tiles from multiple observations
detailed_description: A rio-tiler plugin specifically designed for handling mosaics, allowing the creation of map tiles from multiple raster observations.

name: rio-tiler-mvt
one_line_profile: Plugin to translate tile array to Mapbox Vector Tiles (MVT)
detailed_description: A rio-tiler plugin that encodes tile arrays into Mapbox Vector Tiles (MVT) using python-vtzero, enabling vector-based visualization of raster data.

name: rio-tiler-pds
one_line_profile: Rio-Tiler plugin for public datasets
detailed_description: A plugin for rio-tiler that provides specific readers and helpers for public datasets like Landsat, Sentinel, and CBERS on cloud storage.

name: gdal2tiles-leaflet
one_line_profile: Generate raster image tiles for use with leaflet
detailed_description: A Python tool to generate raster image tiles compatible with Leaflet, based on the GDAL tiling logic.

name: geocube
one_line_profile: Tool to convert geopandas vector data into rasterized xarray data
detailed_description: A tool that simplifies the conversion of vector data (GeoPandas) into raster data (xarray), facilitating integration between vector and raster workflows in Python.

name: rioxarray
one_line_profile: Geospatial xarray extension powered by rasterio
detailed_description: An extension for xarray that adds geospatial capabilities using rasterio, allowing for easy manipulation, reprojection, and export of geospatial raster data within the xarray ecosystem.

name: geocouch
one_line_profile: Spatial index for CouchDB
detailed_description: GeoCouch is a spatial extension for CouchDB that provides spatial indexing and querying capabilities for geospatial data stored in the database.

name: tilestream
one_line_profile: High-performance map tile server powered by MBTiles files
detailed_description: A high-performance map tile server that serves map tiles from MBTiles files, useful for hosting and distributing geospatial visualizations.

name: d3-geo-polygon
one_line_profile: Clipping and geometric operations for spherical polygons
detailed_description: A D3.js module for performing clipping and geometric operations on spherical polygons, essential for correct projection and visualization of global geospatial data.

name: geoscan
one_line_profile: Geospatial clustering at massive scale
detailed_description: A library for performing geospatial clustering (e.g., DBSCAN) at massive scale, optimized for processing large geospatial datasets.

name: census-map-consolidator
one_line_profile: Combine Census blocks into new shapes
detailed_description: A Python tool to consolidate Census blocks into larger custom shapes, useful for demographic analysis and custom geography creation.

name: globalmaptiles
one_line_profile: Library for Google Maps tile coordinates and projection
detailed_description: A Python port of the 'Tiles  la Google Maps' script, providing functions to calculate tile coordinates, bounds, and projections for web mapping.

name: deegree3
one_line_profile: Geospatial core libraries and OGC web service implementations
detailed_description: An open-source Java framework offering geospatial core libraries and implementations of OGC web services (WMS, WFS, etc.) for spatial data infrastructure.

name: dirty-reprojectors
one_line_profile: Approximation library for web map projections
detailed_description: A JavaScript library to create quick and approximate projections for web maps, optimizing performance by trading precision for speed in visualization contexts.

name: lonboard
one_line_profile: Fast interactive geospatial vector data visualization in Jupyter
detailed_description: A Python library designed for high-performance, interactive visualization of large geospatial vector datasets directly within Jupyter notebooks.

name: rio-viz
one_line_profile: Browser-based visualization tool for Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs
detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin that provides a web-based viewer for visualizing Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF (COG) datasets locally or from the cloud, facilitating quick inspection of geospatial raster data.

name: rio-viz-mosaic
one_line_profile: Plugin for visualizing mosaics of Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs
detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin extending rio-viz to support the visualization of mosaics of Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs, enabling users to inspect large-scale composite imagery.

name: tilebench
one_line_profile: Tool for inspecting and profiling Rasterio/GDAL requests
detailed_description: A utility to inspect and profile HEAD, GET, and LIST requests made by Rasterio and GDAL, helping developers optimize geospatial data access performance.

name: TiTiler
one_line_profile: Dynamic map tile server for geospatial raster data
detailed_description: A modern, dynamic tile server built on FastAPI and Rasterio/GDAL, allowing users to create map tile services from Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs and STAC items on the fly.

name: DIPY
one_line_profile: Library for analysis and visualization of medical imaging data
detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for the analysis of 3D/4D+ medical imaging data, focusing on diffusion magnetic resonance imaging (dMRI), spatial normalization, and statistical analysis.

name: diewald_shapeFileReader
one_line_profile: Java library for reading ESRI Shapefiles
detailed_description: A lightweight Java library designed to read and parse ESRI Shapefiles, enabling the integration of vector geospatial data into Java applications.

name: SRGCNN
one_line_profile: Spatial Regression Graph Convolutional Neural Networks
detailed_description: An implementation of Spatial Regression Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (SRGCNN) for conducting spatial regression analysis, including global and geographically weighted regression models.

name: Giotto
one_line_profile: Toolbox for spatial omics data analysis and visualization
detailed_description: A comprehensive R toolbox for the analysis and visualization of spatial expression data (spatial omics), enabling the study of tissue structure and cell interactions.

name: DsgTools
one_line_profile: QGIS plugin for GIS production and data management
detailed_description: A QGIS plugin developed by the Brazilian Army (DSG) to support GIS production workflows, including data acquisition, validation, and database management.

name: pygeotools
one_line_profile: Library for geospatial data processing and analysis
detailed_description: A collection of Python libraries and command-line utilities for geospatial data processing, focusing on raster manipulation, warping, and analysis of satellite imagery and DEMs.

name: PHPCoord
one_line_profile: Library for coordinate conversion and geodesic calculations
detailed_description: A PHP library for handling geospatial coordinates, supporting conversion between various coordinate systems and calculating distances, useful for web-based geospatial applications.

name: dask-rasterio

detailed_description: A Python library that integrates Rasterio with Dask to enable parallel reading, writing, and processing of large geospatial raster datasets.

name: satproc
one_line_profile: Tools for processing geospatial imagery for machine learning
detailed_description: A Python library and CLI toolset designed to preprocess geospatial imagery (e.g., chipping, rescaling) for use in machine learning workflows.

name: datamaps
one_line_profile: Tool for indexing and tiling vector map data
detailed_description: A C-based tool that indexes points and lines and generates map tiles for displaying large vector datasets efficiently.

name: gdal2mbtiles
one_line_profile: Converter from GDAL datasets to MBTiles
detailed_description: A Python tool that converts any GDAL-readable geospatial dataset into the MBTiles format, facilitating the creation of web maps.

name: dbcartajs
one_line_profile: Library for vector data and image visualization on HTML5 Canvas
detailed_description: A JavaScript library for visualizing and interacting with vector data and images using HTML5 Canvas and SVG, supporting projections and coordinate handling.

name: R-ArcGIS-LSM_ToolPack
one_line_profile: Tool pack for Landslide Susceptibility Mapping
detailed_description: A package integrating R and ArcGIS for producing landslide susceptibility maps, including modules for data preparation, feature selection, and machine learning modeling (Logistic Regression, Random Forest).

name: grid_map_geo

detailed_description: A C++ library that provides geolocalization capabilities for grid maps, enabling the integration of elevation data and other geospatial rasters into robotic mapping frameworks.

name: gridviz
one_line_profile: Library for visualizing gridded statistical data
detailed_description: A JavaScript library developed by Eurostat for visualizing gridded statistical data on web maps, supporting various rendering techniques.

name: ProjCL
one_line_profile: OpenCL library for map projections and geodesic calculations
detailed_description: A library that implements map projections, geodesic calculations, and image warping using OpenCL, enabling GPU-accelerated geospatial processing.

name: go-proj
one_line_profile: Go bindings for the PROJ coordinate transformation library
detailed_description: Go language bindings for the PROJ library, allowing Go applications to perform coordinate transformations and geodetic computations.

name: GeoArrays.jl

name: GeoDataFrames.jl

name: GeoTiffCOG

detailed_description: A C# library designed to open and interact with Cloud Optimized GeoTiffs (COG), enabling efficient access to geospatial raster data in .NET environments.

name: tippecanoe

detailed_description: A command-line tool for building vector tilesets from large collections of GeoJSON features, optimized for visualization of massive datasets.

name: go-staticmaps

detailed_description: A Go library and command-line tool to render static map images using OpenStreetMap tiles, useful for generating quick visualizations of geospatial data.

name: proj5

detailed_description: A Rust library for performing coordinate projections and transformations, implementing standard geospatial projection algorithms.

name: mini-map-maker

detailed_description: A Python tool that processes lidar scan data to automatically generate 3D printable STL files, bridging remote sensing data with physical modeling.

name: gdalUtils

detailed_description: An R package that provides wrappers for the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL) utilities, enabling GDAL functionality directly within R scripts.

name: db3dcore

detailed_description: A Java library providing 3D geometric data types, topological nets, and spatial indexing, developed by the Chair in Geoinformatics at KIT.

name: geofileops

detailed_description: A Python library designed to process large geospatial vector files efficiently, utilizing multiprocessing and spatial indexing for speed.

name: geomet
one_line_profile: Pure Python conversion library for common geospatial data formats
detailed_description: A pure Python library for converting between common geospatial data formats such as GeoJSON, WKT, and WKB.

name: dask-geopandas

detailed_description: A Python library that scales GeoPandas operations to multiple cores or clusters using Dask, enabling processing of large geospatial datasets.

name: geopandas

name: gdal-rust

name: geo-index

detailed_description: A library providing packed, immutable, zero-copy spatial indexes (like K-D trees) for efficient spatial querying in Rust and Python.

name: geojson-rust

detailed_description: A Rust library for parsing and generating GeoJSON, a format for encoding a variety of geographic data structures.

name: rstar

detailed_description: A flexible, n-dimensional R*-tree implementation for Rust, used for efficient spatial querying and nearest neighbor search.

name: geotrellis-gdal

detailed_description: A Scala library providing wrappers around GDAL Java bindings, integrated within the GeoTrellis ecosystem for high-performance raster processing.

name: LabCD

detailed_description: A C++ based annotation tool specifically designed for remote sensing change detection tasks, facilitating the creation of training datasets.

name: dans-gdal-scripts

detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages GDAL to convert raster elevation data into Cesium-compatible heightmap terrain tiles, facilitating 3D geospatial visualization.

detailed_description: Provides interfaces (Python, R, etc.) to access WhiteboxTools, an advanced geospatial data analysis platform for processing hydrological, geomorphological, and remote sensing data.

detailed_description: A Python library that enables cloud-native geospatial analysis by turning SpatioTemporal Asset Catalogs (STAC) directly into xarray DataArrays backed by Dask, facilitating efficient processing of large remote sensing datasets.

name: geo-scala

name: coordinate-transformation-library

detailed_description: A Java library specifically designed to transform coordinates between Swedish coordinate systems (RT90, SWEREF99) and WGS84, supporting geodetic data interoperability.

name: population-dynamics

name: Google Earth Enterprise

name: S2 Geometry

name: sopa

name: spatialpandas

name: ggalt

name: ceramic

name: gdalio

name: gpdvega

detailed_description: A Python library that connects GeoPandas dataframes with Altair declarative visualization, enabling seamless charting of geospatial data.

name: geobr

name: geojson

name: WhiteboxTools

name: spatialEco

detailed_description: An R package providing utilities for spatial data analysis and modelling of ecological systems. It includes functions for spatial smoothing, polygon manipulation, and landscape metrics.

name: shapefile2gif
