name: SRAI
one_line_profile: Spatial Representations for Artificial Intelligence toolkit
detailed_description: A Python library focused on creating spatial embeddings and representations for geospatial machine learning tasks. It provides tools to download data from OSM, split areas into regions (H3, S2, etc.), and generate embeddings for downstream AI4S tasks.

name: naip-cogeo-mosaic
one_line_profile: Serverless tile generation for NAIP aerial imagery
detailed_description: A Python toolset to create and serve high-resolution aerial imagery map tiles from Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs) of the National Agriculture Imagery Program (NAIP). It facilitates access to large-scale remote sensing datasets.

name: usgs-topo-tiler
one_line_profile: Reader for USGS Historical Topographic Map tiles
detailed_description: A Python package designed to read and serve Web Mercator map tiles directly from USGS Historical Topographic Maps (GeoTIFFs). It enables integration of historical topography data into modern geospatial workflows.

name: scimap
one_line_profile: Spatial Single-Cell Analysis Toolkit
detailed_description: A scalable toolkit for analyzing spatial molecular data (spatial transcriptomics/proteomics). It performs preprocessing, phenotyping, spatial clustering, and interaction analysis to understand tissue architecture.

name: pyoints
one_line_profile: Processing library for point clouds, voxels and rasters
detailed_description: A Python package for handling and processing geospatial point cloud data (LiDAR), voxel grids, and raster data. It provides algorithms for interpolation, transformation, and analysis of 3D spatial data.

name: docker-lambda
one_line_profile: GDAL-enabled Docker images for AWS Lambda
detailed_description: A set of Docker images and layers optimized for running GDAL and other geospatial libraries in AWS Lambda environment. It serves as critical infrastructure for serverless geospatial data processing workflows.

name: Spatial4j
one_line_profile: Geospatial library for Java
detailed_description: A core Java library for geospatial data handling, providing support for shapes, distance calculations, and coordinate reference systems. It is widely used as a dependency in scientific software (e.g., Lucene/Solr, Elasticsearch) for spatial indexing and operations.

name: go-gdal
one_line_profile: Go wrapper for GDAL
detailed_description: A Go programming language wrapper for the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL). It allows Go developers to utilize GDAL's extensive capabilities for reading and writing raster and vector geospatial data formats.

name: MAPS
one_line_profile: Machine learning for Analysis of Proteomics in Spatial biology
detailed_description: A machine learning pipeline for analyzing spatial proteomics data. It is designed to uncover spatial relationships and patterns in biological tissues, supporting research in spatial biology and pathology.

name: xarray-spatial
one_line_profile: Raster-based Spatial Analytics for Python
detailed_description: A library for performing spatial analysis on raster data using xarray. It implements common geospatial algorithms (slope, aspect, viewshed, proximity, zonal statistics) and is optimized for performance using Numba, integrating well with the PyData scientific stack.

name: opengxt
one_line_profile: Spatial analysis tools for GeoTools and GeoServer
detailed_description: A Java library providing a collection of spatial analysis algorithms and statistics tools. It is designed to extend GeoTools, GeoServer WPS, and uDig with advanced geoprocessing capabilities.

name: COGDumper
one_line_profile: Utility to extract tiles from Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs
detailed_description: A Python utility for inspecting and extracting tiles from Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF (COG) files. It aids in debugging and processing COG data structures in remote sensing workflows.

name: mapnik-vector-tile
one_line_profile: C++ library for encoding and decoding Mapbox Vector Tiles
detailed_description: A C++ implementation of the Mapbox Vector Tile specification, used for creating and parsing vector tiles in GIS applications and tile servers.

name: rio-cloudmask
one_line_profile: Rasterio plugin for cloud detection in satellite imagery
detailed_description: A plugin for the Rasterio CLI that identifies clouds in multi-spectral satellite imagery (e.g., Landsat, Sentinel) to create cloud masks for downstream analysis.

name: rio-color
one_line_profile: Color correction and adjustment plugin for Rasterio
detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin providing color correction operations such as gamma adjustment, saturation, and sigmoidal contrast enhancement for geospatial raster data.

name: rio-glui
one_line_profile: Browser-based visualization tool for Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs
detailed_description: A tool to explore and visualize Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs) directly in the browser using Mapbox GL JS, facilitating quick inspection of raster data.

name: rio-hist
one_line_profile: Histogram matching plugin for Rasterio
detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin that performs histogram matching between a source and a reference raster, useful for normalizing brightness and contrast across different satellite scenes.

name: rio-l8qa
one_line_profile: CLI tool for processing Landsat 8 Quality Assessment bands
detailed_description: A Python library and CLI tool for parsing and interpreting Landsat 8 Quality Assessment (QA) bands to identify pixels with clouds, shadows, or snow.

name: rio-mbtiles
one_line_profile: Rasterio plugin to export rasters to MBTiles format
detailed_description: A command-line plugin for Rasterio that exports geospatial raster datasets into the MBTiles 1.1 SQLite format, facilitating tile-based distribution.

name: rio-mucho
one_line_profile: Parallel processing wrapper for Rasterio
detailed_description: A Python wrapper for Rasterio that enables parallel processing of raster data, improving performance for large-scale geospatial operations.

name: rio-pansharpen
one_line_profile: Pansharpening tool for Landsat scenes
detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin for pansharpening Landsat satellite imagery, merging lower-resolution multispectral bands with a higher-resolution panchromatic band.

name: rio-rgbify
one_line_profile: Tool to encode arbitrary bit depth rasters into RGB tiles
detailed_description: A Rasterio plugin that encodes arbitrary bit-depth raster data (e.g., elevation) into pseudo-base-256 RGB images for web tiles.

name: rio-toa
one_line_profile: Top Of Atmosphere (TOA) reflectance calculator for Landsat 8
detailed_description: A Python library and CLI for calculating Top Of Atmosphere (TOA) reflectance and brightness temperature from Landsat 8 DN values.

name: supercluster
one_line_profile: Fast geospatial point clustering library
detailed_description: A high-performance library for hierarchical clustering of geospatial points, capable of handling millions of points in browsers and Node.js.

name: mapchete
one_line_profile: Framework for tile-based geodata processing
detailed_description: A Python framework for processing raster and vector geodata in a tile-based manner, leveraging Rasterio and Fiona for I/O and handling pyramid generation.

name: spatial-k
one_line_profile: Kotlin Multiplatform libraries for geospatial data manipulation
detailed_description: A set of Kotlin libraries for working with geospatial data, including GeoJSON parsing and spatial operations, supporting multiplatform development.

name: prettymaps
one_line_profile: Tool to draw aesthetic maps from OpenStreetMap data
detailed_description: A Python tool built on top of osmnx, matplotlib, and shapely to retrieve OpenStreetMap data and generate high-quality, artistic map visualizations.

name: geopandas-view
one_line_profile: Interactive exploration tool for GeoPandas GeoDataFrames
detailed_description: A utility to provide interactive map visualizations of GeoPandas GeoDataFrames directly within Jupyter environments, aiding in data exploration and debugging.

name: Basemap
one_line_profile: Matplotlib toolkit for plotting data on map projections
detailed_description: A library for plotting 2D data on maps in Python. It allows users to create maps using various projections and draw coastlines, countries, and rivers.

name: mapshaper
one_line_profile: Tools for editing and simplifying geospatial vector data
detailed_description: A software package for editing Shapefile, GeoJSON, TopoJSON, and CSV files, widely used for topology simplification, format conversion, and data cleaning.

name: mapshaper-proj
one_line_profile: JavaScript port of the Proj.4 map projection library
detailed_description: A JavaScript library for performing map projections, ported from the standard Proj.4 library, used within the mapshaper ecosystem.

name: joiner
one_line_profile: Utility for SQL-like joins on JSON and GeoJSON data
detailed_description: A command-line and library utility for performing SQL-like joins on JSON, GeoJSON, or DBF data, useful for combining attribute data with geospatial geometries.

name: pytorch-cloud-geotiff-optimization
one_line_profile: Toolkit for optimizing cloud GeoTIFF streaming in PyTorch
detailed_description: A toolkit designed to optimize the streaming of Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs) for PyTorch-based deep learning models, enhancing data loading throughput and GPU utilization.

name: refx
one_line_profile: Compile-time safe C++ library for coordinate transformations
detailed_description: A C++ library designed for accurate coordinate transformations and navigation, primarily for mobile robotics but applicable to general geospatial coordinate frame handling.

name: MOTIS
one_line_profile: Multimodal routing, geocoding, and map tiles platform
detailed_description: A comprehensive system for multimodal transportation routing, including modules for geocoding and serving map tiles, suitable for mobility research and transport geography.

name: flatbush
one_line_profile: Fast static spatial index for 2D points and rectangles
detailed_description: A very fast static spatial index for 2D points and rectangles in JavaScript, implementing a packed Hilbert R-tree for efficient geospatial querying.

name: geokdbush
one_line_profile: Fast spatial index for geographic locations
detailed_description: A geographic extension to KDBush, providing fast spatial indexing specifically for geographic locations (latitude/longitude) to perform proximity search.

name: kdbush.hpp
one_line_profile: Fast static spatial index for 2D points in C++
detailed_description: A C++11 port of the KDBush library, providing a fast static spatial index for 2D points, suitable for high-performance geospatial processing.

name: RBush
one_line_profile: High-performance R-tree-based 2D spatial index
detailed_description: A high-performance JavaScript library for 2D spatial indexing of points and rectangles based on the R-tree data structure, optimized for bulk insertion and search.

name: MovingPandas
one_line_profile: Trajectory analysis library based on GeoPandas
detailed_description: A Python library for handling movement data, providing trajectory classes and functions built on top of GeoPandas for analysis of mobility and geospatial trajectories.

name: Trajectools
one_line_profile: Trajectory data analysis tools for QGIS
detailed_description: A QGIS Processing toolbox plugin that provides algorithms for trajectory data analysis, integrating MovingPandas functionality into the QGIS environment.

name: gpd_lite_toolbox
one_line_profile: Convenience toolbox for GeoPandas
detailed_description: A lightweight Python toolbox providing convenience functions and utilities for working with GeoPandas GeoDataFrames, simplifying common geospatial operations.

name: mtm-python-oop
one_line_profile: Object-oriented multi-template matching library
detailed_description: A Python implementation of multi-template matching (MTM) for image analysis, utilizing scikit-image and shapely, suitable for object detection in scientific imaging.

name: cogviewer
one_line_profile: Simple Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF viewer
detailed_description: A lightweight tool for visualizing Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COG), facilitating the inspection of remote sensing raster data.

name: NolinearTimeSeriesAnalysis
one_line_profile: Toolbox for nonlinear time series analysis
detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for performing nonlinear time series analysis, including phase space reconstruction, recurrence network construction, and complexity-entropy analysis.

name: terragpu
one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated remote sensing imagery processing
detailed_description: A Python library developed by NASA NCCS for processing and classifying remote sensing imagery using GPUs and machine learning techniques.

name: node-gdal
one_line_profile: Node.js bindings for GDAL
detailed_description: Node.js bindings for the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL), enabling geospatial raster and vector data processing within Node.js applications.

name: tilestrata
one_line_profile: Pluggable Node.js map tile server
detailed_description: A flexible and pluggable map tile server for Node.js, used for serving geospatial raster or vector tiles in visualization workflows.

name: Neo4j Spatial
one_line_profile: Spatial utilities library for Neo4j
detailed_description: A library for Neo4j that enables spatial operations on graph data, including spatial indexing and geometric search capabilities within the graph database.

name: pygdal
one_line_profile: Virtualenv-friendly GDAL Python bindings
detailed_description: A packaging of standard GDAL Python bindings designed to be friendly with virtualenv and setuptools, facilitating the installation of GDAL in Python scientific environments.

name: MrGeo
one_line_profile: Scalable geospatial toolkit on Apache Spark
detailed_description: A geospatial toolkit designed for scale, built upon Apache Spark and Hadoop to perform raster-based geospatial capabilities on large datasets.

name: h3ronpy
one_line_profile: Python toolkit for H3 geospatial grid
detailed_description: A high-performance Python library providing bindings and tools for the H3 geospatial indexing system, written in Rust for efficiency.

name: simple-data-analysis
one_line_profile: TypeScript library for tabular and geospatial data analysis
detailed_description: A high-performance TypeScript library designed for data analysis, supporting tabular, geospatial, and vector data processing in JavaScript/TypeScript environments.

name: contours
one_line_profile: Vector tile contour generator from USGS data
detailed_description: A tool to generate vector tile contours from USGS elevation data, automating the processing pipeline for topographic visualization.

name: astrometry
one_line_profile: Type-safe astrometry library for TypeScript
detailed_description: A lightweight, zero-dependency library for calculating celestial positions, transit times, and coordinate transformations, enabling astronomy calculations in TypeScript.

name: kriging.js
one_line_profile: JavaScript library for geospatial prediction and mapping via ordinary kriging
detailed_description: A JavaScript library designed for geospatial prediction and mapping using the ordinary kriging algorithm. It allows for client-side interpolation of spatial data, enabling the creation of continuous surfaces from point data directly in web browsers.

name: MBC
one_line_profile: MATLAB postprocessor for Multi-Blade Coordinate transformation of wind turbine models
detailed_description: A MATLAB-based postprocessor developed by the National Wind Technology Center (NWTC) for performing Multi-Blade Coordinate (MBC) transformation on wind turbine state-space models. It aids in the analysis of wind turbine dynamics by transforming rotating frames to fixed frames.

name: Start_maja
one_line_profile: Wrapper to process Sentinel-2 time series with MAJA processor
detailed_description: A Python tool designed to facilitate the processing of Sentinel-2 satellite image time series using the MAJA (MACCS-ATCOR Joint Algorithm) cloud detection and atmospheric correction processor. It streamlines the workflow for generating Level-2A products.

name: satellitetools
one_line_profile: Tools for retrieving Sentinel-2 data and computing biophysical parameters
detailed_description: A Python package to fetch Sentinel-2 data from Google Earth Engine or AWS Open Data and compute biophysical parameters (like LAI, FAPAR) using algorithms derived from the SNAP Biophysical processor.

name: turfpy
one_line_profile: Python library for geospatial data analysis reimplementing turf.js
detailed_description: A Python library that ports the functionality of Turf.js, providing a wide range of geospatial analysis tools such as buffering, union, intersection, and measurement operations for GeoJSON data.

name: Open Data Cube Core
one_line_profile: Platform for analyzing continental-scale Earth Observation data
detailed_description: The core library of the Open Data Cube (ODC) initiative, providing a framework for indexing, accessing, and analyzing large collections of Earth Observation data (satellite imagery) as a multi-dimensional data cube.

name: WhiteboxTools-ArcGIS
one_line_profile: ArcGIS Python Toolbox for WhiteboxTools
detailed_description: A Python Toolbox that integrates the WhiteboxTools geospatial analysis library into ArcGIS, allowing users to run WhiteboxTools algorithms directly within the ArcGIS environment.

name: anymap
one_line_profile: Interactive mapping with anywidget and JavaScript libraries
detailed_description: A Python package that facilitates the creation of interactive maps within Jupyter environments by leveraging 'anywidget' to bridge Python with popular JavaScript mapping libraries.

name: GeoAI
one_line_profile: Artificial Intelligence for Geospatial Data
detailed_description: A Python package designed to apply artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques specifically to geospatial data, facilitating tasks such as image segmentation, object detection, and spatial prediction.

name: leafmap
one_line_profile: Interactive mapping and geospatial analysis in Jupyter
detailed_description: A Python package for interactive mapping and geospatial analysis with minimal coding in a Jupyter environment. It supports various mapping backends (Leaflet, Mapbox, etc.) and provides tools for data visualization and analysis.

name: mapwidget
one_line_profile: Custom Jupyter widgets for interactive 2D/3D maps
detailed_description: A collection of custom Jupyter widgets that enable the creation of interactive 2D and 3D maps using popular JavaScript libraries like Cesium, Mapbox, and Leaflet, with bidirectional communication between Python and JavaScript.

name: whitebox-python
one_line_profile: Python frontend for WhiteboxTools
detailed_description: The Python frontend for WhiteboxTools, an advanced geospatial data analysis platform. It provides a Pythonic interface to access hundreds of tools for GIS analysis, geomorphometry, hydrology, and LiDAR processing.

name: whiteboxR
one_line_profile: R frontend for WhiteboxTools
detailed_description: The R frontend for WhiteboxTools, enabling R users to access the extensive geospatial analysis capabilities of the WhiteboxTools engine for tasks such as hydrological modeling and terrain analysis.

name: whiteboxgui
one_line_profile: Interactive GUI for WhiteboxTools in Jupyter
detailed_description: An interactive Graphical User Interface (GUI) for WhiteboxTools designed to run within a Jupyter-based environment, making it easier to discover and execute geospatial analysis tools without writing code.

name: openglobus
one_line_profile: 3D maps and geospatial data visualization engine
detailed_description: A TypeScript/JavaScript library for creating high-performance 3D maps and visualizing geospatial data. It serves as a virtual globe engine similar to Cesium, supporting various map tiles and terrain data.

name: openmaptiles-tools
one_line_profile: Tools for processing OpenMapTiles schema and formats
detailed_description: A collection of tools to assist in the generation and management of vector tiles based on the OpenMapTiles schema. It includes utilities for database importation, SQL generation, and tile processing.

name: vtm
one_line_profile: Vector-tile map library for Java/Android
detailed_description: A vector-tile map rendering library written in Java, capable of running on Android, desktop, and web browsers. It is developed by the OpenScienceMap project for scientific and general mapping applications.

name: InteractiveVis
one_line_profile: Library for creating interactive geospatial and network visualizations
detailed_description: A project by the Oxford Internet Institute to facilitate the creation of interactive visualizations for geospatial and network data using native web technologies (HTML5, SVG). It aims to produce self-contained visualizations suitable for offline use.

name: GeoRasters
one_line_profile: Python module for fast GIS raster file processing
detailed_description: A Python module that provides tools to easily read, write, and manipulate GIS raster files. It simplifies operations like merging, aggregation, and masking of raster data.

name: Coordinate-System
one_line_profile: Computable coordinate system object for transformations
detailed_description: A C++ project introducing a computable coordinate system object to bridge theoretical frameworks and numerical computations in coordinate transformations, useful for physics and robotics modeling.

name: orb
one_line_profile: 2D geometry types and utilities for Go
detailed_description: A Golang library providing a set of types and utilities for working with 2D geometry, including clipping, simplification, and spatial operations. It serves as a foundational library for geospatial applications in Go.

name: pyimpute
one_line_profile: Spatial classification and regression using Scikit-learn and Rasterio
detailed_description: A Python library that facilitates spatial prediction by integrating Scikit-learn's machine learning capabilities with Rasterio's geospatial data handling. It streamlines the process of training models on raster data and generating spatial predictions.

name: shapelysmooth
one_line_profile: Polyline smoothing package for Shapely
detailed_description: A Python package that extends the Shapely library to provide functionality for smoothing polylines, useful for cartographic generalization and improving the aesthetic quality of vector lines.

name: topo
one_line_profile: Geometry library for Elixir
detailed_description: A geometry library for the Elixir programming language that enables the calculation of spatial relationships (like intersection, contains) between geometries, supporting geospatial applications in the Elixir ecosystem.

name: gpq
one_line_profile: Utility for working with GeoParquet files
detailed_description: A command-line utility and Go library for working with GeoParquet, a cloud-native vector format. It allows for validating, inspecting, and converting geospatial data to and from GeoParquet.

name: rio-stac-io
one_line_profile: Rasterio extension for STAC Items
detailed_description: A Python library that provides an extension for Rasterio to read SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog (STAC) Items and ItemCollections directly using native GDAL drivers.

name: GISportal
one_line_profile: Web-based GIS visualization and analysis platform
detailed_description: A web-based GIS tool developed by Plymouth Marine Laboratory for the visualisation and analysis of geospatial data, particularly suited for oceanographic and earth observation data.

name: net2cog
one_line_profile: Service to transform NetCDF to Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF
detailed_description: A Harmony service developed by NASA PO.DAAC for transforming NetCDF files into Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs (COG), facilitating cloud-native geospatial workflows.

name: BANKSY
one_line_profile: Spatial clustering algorithm for transcriptomics
detailed_description: A spatial clustering algorithm that unifies cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation for spatial transcriptomics analysis. It incorporates spatial context into clustering to improve cell type identification.

name: proj4js
one_line_profile: JavaScript library for coordinate transformations
detailed_description: A JavaScript library to transform coordinates from one coordinate system to another, including datum transformations. It is a port of the PROJ library.

name: simple-tiles
one_line_profile: Simple map tile generation library
detailed_description: A C library for generating map tiles from shapefiles and other geospatial data sources. It focuses on simplicity and speed for creating raster map tiles.

name: PMTiles
one_line_profile: Single-file archive format for map pyramids
detailed_description: A library and specification for storing pyramids of map tiles (vector or raster) in a single file, optimized for cloud storage and range requests.

name: pygeoops
one_line_profile: Extended spatial functions library for Python
detailed_description: A Python library providing less common or extended spatial functions that complement standard libraries like Shapely, focusing on performance and specific geometric operations.

name: pyproj
one_line_profile: Python interface to PROJ library
detailed_description: A Python interface to PROJ, the standard library for cartographic projections and coordinate transformations. It enables conversion between different coordinate reference systems (CRS).

name: pyrosm
one_line_profile: Fast OpenStreetMap data reader for Python
detailed_description: A Python library for reading OpenStreetMap (OSM) data from Protocol Buffer (PBF) files into GeoPandas GeoDataFrames. It is optimized for speed and memory efficiency.

name: esda
one_line_profile: Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis library
detailed_description: A Python library for Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis (ESDA), providing statistics for spatial autocorrelation (Moran's I, Geary's C) and other spatial patterns. Part of the PySAL ecosystem.

name: libpysal
one_line_profile: Core components of PySAL
detailed_description: The core library of the Python Spatial Analysis Library (PySAL) ecosystem, providing basic spatial data structures (weights, graphs) and file I/O functionality.

name: PySAL
one_line_profile: Python Spatial Analysis Library meta-package
detailed_description: A meta-package for the Python Spatial Analysis Library (PySAL) ecosystem, aggregating various modules for spatial analysis, econometrics, and visualization.

name: scikit-gmsh
one_line_profile: Python interface for Gmsh mesh generation
detailed_description: A Python interface to Gmsh, allowing for the generation of 3D finite element meshes using a scikit-style API. Useful for physics simulations and modeling.

name: dggridR

detailed_description: An R package for working with Discrete Global Grids (DGGs), specifically the ISEA3H grid system. It allows for binning spatial data into hexagonal or triangular cells for analysis.

name: sf

detailed_description: The standard R package for handling geospatial vector data using Simple Features. It provides a tidyverse-compatible interface for reading, writing, and manipulating spatial data.

name: Rasters.jl

detailed_description: A Julia library for manipulating and analysing raster data. It provides high-performance primitives for handling multi-dimensional geospatial arrays.

name: EOmaps
one_line_profile: Interactive maps for geographical datasets
detailed_description: A Python library to create interactive maps of geographical datasets. It is designed to handle large datasets and provides features for data visualization and analysis.

name: rasterio
one_line_profile: Geospatial raster I/O for Python
detailed_description: A core Python library for reading and writing geospatial raster datasets. It provides a Pythonic interface to GDAL's raster drivers.

name: eodatadown
one_line_profile: Automated EO data download and processing workflow
detailed_description: A system for automating the download and processing of Earth Observation data (e.g., Sentinel, Landsat) to create analysis-ready data products. Developed by the RSGISLib team.

name: rsgislib
one_line_profile: Remote Sensing and GIS Software Library
detailed_description: A comprehensive library of remote sensing and GIS tools, providing advanced processing capabilities for raster and vector data, including segmentation and classification.

name: ugrid2shp

detailed_description: A Python tool developed by RENCI to compute GIS shapefiles (contours) from CF-UGRID compliant NetCDF files, bridging the gap between scientific modeling outputs and GIS.

name: iCellR

detailed_description: iCellR is designed to facilitate the analysis and visualization of high-throughput single-cell sequencing data, supporting technologies like scRNA-seq, scVDJ-seq, and scATAC-seq.

name: rgeo

detailed_description: RGeo is a geospatial data library for Ruby that provides an implementation of the OGC Simple Features Specification, allowing for the creation, manipulation, and analysis of spatial data.

name: MODIStsp

detailed_description: An R package for automating the creation of time series of rasters derived from MODIS Land Products data. It handles download, mosaicking, reprojection, and resizing.

name: smapr

detailed_description: An R package designed for the acquisition and processing of NASA Soil Moisture Active Passive (SMAP) data, facilitating access to global soil moisture datasets.

name: tiler

detailed_description: An R package for generating map tiles from various spatial formats, supporting both geographic and non-geographic coordinate systems for visualization.

name: cog_validator

detailed_description: A Python-based tool and service to validate whether a TIFF file complies with the Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF (COG) format specifications.

name: spatial-trees

detailed_description: A Common Lisp library providing dynamic index data structures (like R-trees) for efficiently handling and querying spatially-extended data.

name: R-sharp

name: libh3

detailed_description: A Rust library providing bindings or implementation for Uber's Hexagonal Hierarchical Spatial Index (H3), used for spatial indexing and analysis.

name: raster-process
one_line_profile: Raster data processing utilities
detailed_description: A TypeScript library providing utilities for processing raster data, likely for web-based GIS applications.

name: sat-process
one_line_profile: Multispectral processing on geospatial raster data
detailed_description: A Python library for processing multispectral geospatial raster data, facilitating tasks such as band stacking and color correction.

name: scvi-tools
one_line_profile: Deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell and spatial omics data
detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell and spatial omics data, providing models for dimensionality reduction, integration, and differential expression.

name: squidpy
one_line_profile: Spatial Single Cell Analysis in Python
detailed_description: Squidpy is a tool for the analysis and visualization of spatial molecular data, interacting with scanpy and anndata to handle spatial transcriptomics.

name: q3c

detailed_description: Q3C is a PostgreSQL extension designed for fast indexing and querying of large astronomical datasets or other data on a sphere (sky coverage).

name: remotior_sensus
one_line_profile: Processing of remote sensing images and GIS data
detailed_description: A Python package that allows for the processing of remote sensing images and GIS data, including classification and preprocessing tasks.

name: titiler-openeo
one_line_profile: openEO implementation using TiTiler
detailed_description: An extension or implementation that connects TiTiler (a dynamic tile server) with openEO standards for processing Earth Observation data.

name: eoreader
one_line_profile: Sensor-agnostic remote sensing library
detailed_description: A remote-sensing Python library that reads optical and SAR sensors, loads and stacks bands, and handles clouds, DEMs, and spectral indices in a sensor-agnostic way.

name: shapely

detailed_description: Shapely is a Python package for manipulation and analysis of planar geometric objects. It is based on the GEOS library and is a fundamental tool in the Python geospatial ecosystem.

name: biodiverse
one_line_profile: Tool for the spatial analysis of diversity
detailed_description: Biodiverse is a tool for the spatial analysis of diversity using indices based on taxonomic, phylogenetic, and functional relationships.

name: Geo
one_line_profile: A geospatial library for .NET applications
detailed_description: A .NET library designed for handling geospatial data types and operations, enabling developers to perform spatial analysis and data manipulation within the .NET ecosystem.

name: LULC-Change-Detection-Tool
one_line_profile: Semi-automated Land Use/Land Cover change detection tool
detailed_description: A semi-automated tool for detecting changes in Land Use and Land Cover (LULC) using PCA and supervised machine learning classifiers.

name: SitsSCD
one_line_profile: Multi-temporal UTAE for satellite image time series change detection
detailed_description: Implementation of a multi-temporal U-TAE (U-Net + Temporal Attention Encoder) model for semantic change detection in satellite image time series.

name: VcT_Remote_Sensing_Change_Detection
one_line_profile: Visual change Transformer (VcT) implementation for remote sensing image change detection
detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Visual change Transformer (VcT) model for detecting changes in bitemporal remote sensing images. It utilizes a transformer-based architecture to capture long-range dependencies and visual changes between time-series satellite imagery.

name: REMAINS
one_line_profile: R package for simulating landscape dynamics and fire disturbance
detailed_description: An R package designed to simulate landscape dynamics, including wildfires, post-fire regeneration, forest recovery, and land-cover changes such as plantation and agricultural conversion. It is used for ecological modeling and assessing landscape resilience.

name: CCDC (GERSL)
one_line_profile: Continuous Change Detection and Classification algorithm for Landsat time series
detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Continuous Change Detection and Classification (CCDC) algorithm. It uses all available Landsat data to detect land cover changes and classify land cover types based on time-series models.

name: TIF
one_line_profile: Time-series-based Image Fusion algorithm for Landsat and Sentinel-2
detailed_description: A MATLAB algorithm for fusing 30-m Landsat data into 10-m Sentinel-2 grids. It provides fine-resolution, dense time series data by integrating multi-source remote sensing imagery, improving accuracy for downstream monitoring.

name: Deeply Supervised Image Fusion Network
one_line_profile: Deeply supervised fusion network for change detection in high-resolution images
detailed_description: An implementation of a deeply supervised image fusion network designed for change detection in high-resolution bi-temporal remote sensing images. It focuses on fusing features to accurately identify changes.

name: LSNet
one_line_profile: Lightweight Siamese Network for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: Source code for LSNet, an extremely lightweight Siamese Network designed for efficient change detection in remote sensing images. It aims to reduce computational complexity while maintaining detection performance.

name: IndustrialSmokePlumeDetection
one_line_profile: Deep learning model for detecting industrial smoke plumes from satellite data
detailed_description: A codebase for characterizing and detecting industrial smoke plumes using remote sensing data. It applies machine learning techniques to identify pollution sources and monitor emissions relevant to climate change studies.

name: SSLI
one_line_profile: Self-supervised learning for reconstructing harmonized Landsat Sentinel-2 time series
detailed_description: A tool for reconstructing seamless Harmonized Landsat Sentinel-2 (HLS) time series using self-supervised learning. It addresses gaps and inconsistencies in satellite time series data to enable continuous monitoring.

name: demeter
one_line_profile: Land use and land cover disaggregation and change detection model
detailed_description: A model developed by JGCRI for disaggregating land use/land cover data and detecting changes. It is used to analyze spatial patterns of land use change and their implications for global change research.

name: rtsVis
one_line_profile: R package for visualizing raster time series data
detailed_description: An R package designed for the visualization of raster time series, particularly useful for remote sensing data. It allows for the creation of intuitive visualizations to explore spatiotemporal changes.

name: Land-Cover-Analysis
one_line_profile: Land cover change detection using satellite image segmentation
detailed_description: A tool for detecting land cover changes by applying segmentation techniques to satellite imagery. It facilitates the analysis of environmental changes over time through automated image processing.

name: LandTrendr-2012
one_line_profile: Original IDL implementation of the LandTrendr algorithm
detailed_description: The original IDL code for LandTrendr (Landsat-based Detection of Trends in Disturbance and Recovery), a widely used algorithm for analyzing spectral trajectories of land surface change using Landsat time series.

name: TTP (Time Travelling Pixels)
one_line_profile: Bitemporal feature integration with foundation models for change detection
detailed_description: Implementation of the 'Time Travelling Pixels' method, which integrates bitemporal features using foundation models for remote sensing image change detection. It leverages advanced deep learning architectures to improve detection accuracy.

name: janus
one_line_profile: Agent-Based Model for land use/land cover change and multisector dynamics
detailed_description: An object-oriented Agent-Based Model (ABM) developed by Boise State University for simulating land use and land cover change (LULC) and multisector dynamics. It models human-environment interactions to project future landscape scenarios.

name: SenseEarth2020-ChangeDetection
one_line_profile: High-performance solution for satellite image change detection
detailed_description: The 1st place solution to the SenseEarth2020 Satellite Remote Sensing Image Change Detection Challenge. It provides a robust deep learning pipeline for identifying changes in satellite imagery, serving as a high-quality reference implementation.

name: SwinSTFM
one_line_profile: Remote sensing spatiotemporal fusion using Swin Transformer
detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing Swin Transformers for spatiotemporal fusion of remote sensing images. It aims to generate high-resolution time-series data by fusing inputs from different sensors.

name: SARveillance
one_line_profile: Sentinel-1 SAR time series analysis tool for OSINT
detailed_description: A tool for analyzing Sentinel-1 Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) time series data. While designed for OSINT, it provides scientific capabilities for monitoring surface changes and analyzing radar backscatter over time.

name: crop-type-mapping
one_line_profile: Self-attention based crop type mapping from optical satellite time series
detailed_description: Source code for classifying crop types using self-attention mechanisms on raw optical satellite time series data. It enables accurate agricultural mapping and monitoring through temporal pattern analysis.

name: CMAT
one_line_profile: Coal Mining Assessment Tool for monitoring land disturbance in GEE
detailed_description: A Google Earth Engine tool developed by NASA DEVELOP for monitoring the impacts and reclamation efforts of coal mines. It utilizes Landsat time series and the LandTrendr algorithm to assess land disturbance and recovery.

name: ESVIA
one_line_profile: Elkhorn Slough Vegetation Imagery Assessment tool in GEE
detailed_description: A suite of Google Earth Engine scripts for analyzing vegetation change and productivity using Landsat and Sentinel-2 imagery. It supports vegetation index calculation, change detection, and data export for ecological assessment.

name: SAMWS
one_line_profile: Weakly supervised crop mapping using Segment Anything Model
detailed_description: A method for crop mapping using Sentinel-2 time series images, leveraging the Segment Anything Model (SAM) in a weakly supervised learning framework. It aims to improve crop classification with limited labeled data.

name: RSimageProcess_for_ChangeDetection
one_line_profile: Preprocessing library for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: A collection of remote sensing image processing scripts commonly used for deep learning-based change detection. It includes utilities for data preparation, augmentation, and preprocessing.

name: MSPSNet
one_line_profile: Deep Multiscale Siamese Network for change detection
detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of MSPSNet (Deep Multiscale Siamese Network with Parallel Convolutional Structure and Self-Attention). It is designed for detecting changes in remote sensing images by capturing multiscale features.

name: Building-Height-Estimation_SEN12_IGARSS23
one_line_profile: CNN regression model for building height estimation using Sentinel-1/2 time series
detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) regression model designed to estimate building height maps by fusing Sentinel-1 SAR and Sentinel-2 MSI time series data, as presented at IGARSS 2023.

name: Large-Scale-Building-Height-Estimation-RSE24
one_line_profile: Large-scale building height estimation using Sentinel-1/2 time series
detailed_description: Implementation of a deep learning model for large-scale estimation of building heights utilizing multi-temporal Sentinel-1 SAR and Sentinel-2 MSI data, published in Remote Sensing of Environment (RSE) 2024.

name: A-robust-unsupervised-small-area-change-detection
one_line_profile: Unsupervised small-area change detection for SAR images
detailed_description: A multi-module unsupervised change detection method specifically designed for multi-temporal Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images using deep learning techniques.

name: CCD-Plugin
one_line_profile: Continuous Change Detection (CCDC) plugin for Google Earth Engine
detailed_description: A plugin that utilizes Google Earth Engine to retrieve Landsat or Sentinel-2 datasets and execute the Continuous Change Detection (CCDC) algorithm for analyzing trends and breakpoints in multi-year time series.

name: SiameseSSL
one_line_profile: Semi-supervised urban change detection with Siamese networks
detailed_description: Implementation of a Dual-Task Siamese network for urban change detection using semi-supervised learning, as presented at IGARSS.

name: SUNet-change_detection
one_line_profile: Change detection for heterogeneous remote sensing images
detailed_description: Implementation of SUNet, a Dual-Channel Fully Convolution Network designed for change detection in heterogeneous remote sensing images from satellites and UAVs.

name: EOWater
one_line_profile: Water surface area time-series retrieval in GEE
detailed_description: A tool to retrieve water surface area time-series from Sentinel-2 and Landsat data using Google Earth Engine (GEE).

name: Friendly-InSAR-time-series
one_line_profile: Workflow for Sentinel-1 InSAR time series analysis
detailed_description: A user-friendly workflow for producing Sentinel-1 InSAR time series utilizing ISCE 2 and MintPy software packages.

name: lightweight-temporal-attention-pytorch
one_line_profile: Light Temporal Attention Encoder (L-TAE) for satellite time series
detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the Light Temporal Attention Encoder (L-TAE) designed for classifying satellite image time series.

name: pytorch-psetae
one_line_profile: Pixel-Set Encoders and Temporal Self-Attention for SITS
detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the Pixel-Set Encoder and Temporal Self-Attention (PSE-TAE) model for satellite image time series classification.

name: SegChange-R1
one_line_profile: LLM-augmented reasoning for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: A framework leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to augment reasoning capabilities for remote sensing change detection tasks.

name: DMINet
one_line_profile: Dual-branch Multi-level Inter-temporal Network for change detection
detailed_description: Implementation of DMINet, a network for change detection on bi-temporal remote sensing images using dual-branch multi-level inter-temporal features (TGARS 2023).

name: ICIF-Net
one_line_profile: Intra-Scale Cross-Interaction Network for change detection
detailed_description: Implementation of ICIF-Net, a network focusing on intra-scale cross-interaction and inter-scale feature fusion for bi-temporal remote sensing change detection (TGARS 2022).

name: bfast-explorer
one_line_profile: Shiny app for breakpoint detection in Landsat time series using BFAST algorithms
detailed_description: A Shiny application designed to facilitate the exploration and detection of breakpoints in Landsat pixel time series. It leverages BFAST-based algorithms to analyze temporal changes in satellite imagery, providing an interactive interface for remote sensing analysis.

name: SAR2NDVI_CNN
one_line_profile: CNN model for estimating NDVI from Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 time series
detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) implementation trained to estimate Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) values by coupling Synthetic Aperture Radar (Sentinel-1) and optical (Sentinel-2) time-series data, enabling vegetation monitoring through data fusion.

name: rts
one_line_profile: R package for raster time series analysis
detailed_description: An R package providing classes and methods for manipulating and analyzing raster time series data. It supports handling large stacks of raster images and performing temporal analysis, widely used in remote sensing and environmental monitoring.

name: LPJ-wsl_v2.0
one_line_profile: Dynamic global vegetation model with land use and cover change
detailed_description: A version of the LPJ (Lund-Potsdam-Jena) Dynamic Global Vegetation Model (DGVM) that incorporates land use and land cover change (LULCC) and forest demography. It is used for simulating global vegetation dynamics and carbon cycle responses to climate and land use changes.

name: bfast
one_line_profile: R package for Breaks For Additive Season and Trend analysis
detailed_description: The canonical R package implementation of the BFAST (Breaks For Additive Season and Trend) algorithm. It integrates the decomposition of time series into trend, seasonal, and remainder components with methods for detecting and characterizing abrupt changes within the trend and seasonal components, widely used in remote sensing.

name: geeBfastMonitor
one_line_profile: Google Earth Engine implementation of the BFAST monitor algorithm
detailed_description: A JavaScript implementation of the BFAST (Breaks For Additive Season and Trend) monitor algorithm designed to run on the Google Earth Engine (GEE) platform. It enables scalable, cloud-based monitoring of disturbances in satellite image time series.

name: stmetrics
one_line_profile: Python package for extracting metrics from satellite image time series
detailed_description: A Python package developed by the Brazil Data Cube project to extract temporal metrics from satellite image time series. It provides functions to compute various statistical and phenological metrics useful for land use and land cover classification and change detection.

name: bowfast
one_line_profile: Pipeline wrapper for bowtie and bfast sequence alignment
detailed_description: A shell script pipeline that coordinates the execution of Bowtie and BFAST (Blat-like Fast Accurate Search Tool) for aligning colorspace reads in bioinformatics. While the domain differs from the cluster context, it is a valid scientific tool for sequence data processing.

name: temporalCNN
one_line_profile: Temporal CNN for satellite image time series classification
detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a Temporal Convolutional Neural Network specifically designed for the classification of Satellite Image Time Series (SITS). It serves as a solver for temporal pattern recognition in remote sensing data.

name: ChangeDINO
one_line_profile: DINOv3-driven building change detection model
detailed_description: The official PyTorch implementation of the ChangeDINO model, which utilizes a DINOv3-driven architecture for building change detection in optical remote sensing imagery. It represents a state-of-the-art deep learning solver for change detection tasks.

name: MTKD-CD
one_line_profile: Multi-Teacher Knowledge Distillation framework for change detection
detailed_description: Implementation of a robust Multi-Teacher Knowledge Distillation (MTKD) framework for remote sensing change detection. It includes the JL1-CD benchmark and provides a deep learning solver for improving change detection accuracy through knowledge distillation.

name: bfast-cran-mirror
one_line_profile: CRAN mirror of the bfast R package
detailed_description: A read-only mirror of the CRAN R package 'bfast' (Breaks For Additive Season and Trend). It contains the source code for the widely used algorithm for detecting trend and seasonal changes in time series data.

name: osaris
one_line_profile: Scripts for parallel InSAR processing of Sentinel-1 time series
detailed_description: A collection of scripts designed to facilitate parallel Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) processing and analysis of Sentinel-1 time series on High Performance Computing (HPC) clusters. It wraps GMTSAR and Slurm for efficient large-scale processing.

name: bfast-gpu
one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated implementation of the BFAST algorithm for time series analysis
detailed_description: A GPU implementation of the BFAST (Breaks For Additive Season and Trend) algorithm, designed to accelerate the detection of structural changes in time series data, particularly for remote sensing applications.

name: pysits
one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the R 'sits' package for satellite image time series analysis
detailed_description: A Python interface to the 'sits' R package, enabling Python users to perform satellite image time series analysis, land use classification, and change detection using the underlying R functionality.

name: sits
one_line_profile: End-to-end toolkit for satellite image time series analysis and classification
detailed_description: An R package for satellite image time series analysis, providing tools for data retrieval, visualization, clustering, and classification using machine learning and deep learning methods for land use and land cover change.

name: LT-GEE
one_line_profile: LandTrendr spectral-temporal segmentation algorithm for Google Earth Engine
detailed_description: A Google Earth Engine (GEE) implementation of the LandTrendr (Landsat-based Detection of Trends in Disturbance and Recovery) algorithm, used for trajectory-based change detection in spectral time series.

name: lt-gee-py
one_line_profile: Python interface for LandTrendr on Google Earth Engine
detailed_description: The Python API interface for the LandTrendr spectral-temporal segmentation algorithm on Google Earth Engine, allowing integration of LandTrendr workflows into Python-based geospatial analysis.

name: nrt
one_line_profile: Near Real-Time monitoring of satellite image time-series
detailed_description: A Python library developed by the European Commission's Joint Research Centre (JRC) for near real-time monitoring of satellite image time series to detect disturbances and changes.

name: rtsa
one_line_profile: Raster Time Series Analysis package for R
detailed_description: An R package designed for processing and analyzing raster time series data, providing functions for temporal smoothing, interpolation, and phenology extraction.

name: geeViz
one_line_profile: Google Earth Engine visualization and analysis library
detailed_description: A library of Google Earth Engine (GEE) tools produced by the US Forest Service Geospatial Technology Applications Center for visualizing and analyzing geospatial data, including time series.

name: hants
one_line_profile: Python implementation of Harmonic Analysis of Time Series (HANTS)
detailed_description: A Python module implementing the HANTS algorithm for reconstructing and smoothing time series of raster data, commonly used in remote sensing to remove cloud contamination and fill gaps.

name: SAR-Change-Detection
one_line_profile: Deep learning based change detection for SAR imagery
detailed_description: Implementation of improved difference images for change detection classifiers in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) imagery using deep learning techniques.

name: bayts
one_line_profile: Probabilistic change detection for satellite time series
detailed_description: A set of tools to apply a probabilistic approach for combining multiple optical and/or Radar satellite time series to detect deforestation and forest cover loss in near real-time.

name: STANet
one_line_profile: Spatial-Temporal Attention Network for change detection
detailed_description: A spatial-temporal attention neural network (STANet) designed to capture spatiotemporal dependencies in remote sensing image change detection tasks.

name: SaDL_CD
one_line_profile: Semantic-Aware Dense Representation Learning for Change Detection
detailed_description: Implementation of Semantic-Aware Dense Representation Learning for Remote Sensing Image Change Detection.

name: PyPS
one_line_profile: Python Distributed Scatterer scripts for InSAR
detailed_description: A set of Python scripts for processing Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) time series using Distributed Scatterer methods, supporting Sentinel and ALOS data.

name: FCSN_CD
one_line_profile: Fully Convolutional Siamese Networks for Change Detection
detailed_description: Implementation of Fully Convolutional Siamese Networks for change detection in remote sensing images, as presented at IGARSS 2018.

name: VisTA
one_line_profile: Visual Question Answering for Change Detection
detailed_description: A model for grounding and question answering in remote sensing change detection, enabling natural language interaction to query what and where changes occurred.

name: SNUNet-CD
one_line_profile: Densely Connected Siamese Network for Change Detection
detailed_description: Implementation of SNUNet-CD, a densely connected Siamese network designed for change detection in very high resolution (VHR) images.

name: Open-CD
one_line_profile: Comprehensive Change Detection Toolbox
detailed_description: A comprehensive, open-source toolbox for remote sensing change detection, built on top of standard deep learning frameworks to facilitate research and development.

name: CropLand-CD
one_line_profile: Fine-grained Cropland Change Detection
detailed_description: A CNN-transformer network with multi-scale context aggregation specifically designed for fine-grained change detection in cropland areas.

name: DSAMNet
one_line_profile: Deeply Supervised Attention Metric-Based Network
detailed_description: Implementation of DSAMNet for remote sensing change detection, featuring deep supervision and attention metric-based learning.

name: SYSU-CD
one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Change Detection Dataset
detailed_description: A dataset designed for remote sensing change detection, often used as a benchmark for evaluating change detection algorithms.

name: DTCDN
one_line_profile: Deep Translation Based Change Detection Network
detailed_description: A deep translation (GAN) based change detection network designed for handling optical and SAR remote sensing images.

name: SEIFNet
one_line_profile: Spatiotemporal Enhancement and Interlevel Fusion Network
detailed_description: A network for remote sensing image change detection that focuses on spatiotemporal enhancement and interlevel feature fusion.

name: Heterogeneous_CD
one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Change Detection in Remote Sensing
detailed_description: Software developed for heterogeneous change detection in remote sensing images, addressing the challenge of comparing images from different sensors.

name: bfastSpatial
one_line_profile: Spatial BFAST for satellite image time-series
detailed_description: A set of utilities and wrappers to perform change detection on satellite image time-series (Landsat and MODIS) using the bfastmonitor approach, including pre-processing and spatial implementation.

name: HGINet-torch
one_line_profile: Hierarchical semantic graph interaction network for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of HGINet for semantic change detection in high-resolution remote sensing images, utilizing a hierarchical semantic graph interaction mechanism.

name: EGRCNN
one_line_profile: Edge-guided Recurrent CNN for building change detection
detailed_description: An implementation of the Edge-guided Recurrent Convolutional Neural Network (EGRCNN) specifically designed for detecting building changes in multi-temporal remote sensing images.

name: rice-irrigation-mapping-s1s2
one_line_profile: Framework for classifying rice irrigation methods using Sentinel-1/2 time series
detailed_description: A machine learning framework developed by Microsoft for mapping rice field irrigation methods (AWD vs CF) and sowing practices using Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 satellite time series data.

name: remotePARTS
one_line_profile: Partitioned spatio-temporal auto regression analyses for remote sensing
detailed_description: An R package providing tools for running partitioned spatio-temporal autoregression analyses specifically designed for large-scale remotely-sensed datasets.

name: ScratchFormer
one_line_profile: Transformers trained from scratch for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation using Transformers trained from scratch specifically for change detection tasks in remote sensing imagery.

name: siamese-change-detection
one_line_profile: Siamese neural networks for multi-temporal image change detection
detailed_description: A tool utilizing Siamese neural networks for targeted synthesis and change detection in multi-temporal remote sensing images.

name: remote_sensing_change_detection
one_line_profile: Collection of deep learning models for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: A repository containing implementations of multiple mainstream remote sensing change detection networks (e.g., CDNet, FC-EF, UNet++, etc.), serving as a benchmark library.

name: nf-core/rangeland
one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing remotely sensed imagery for land-cover change
detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed by nf-core for processing satellite imagery and auxiliary data to generate trend files related to land-cover changes in rangelands.

name: lstm-sentinel2-landcover
one_line_profile: LSTM-based deep learning for land cover change detection
detailed_description: Code implementation for land cover change detection using Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks on Sentinel-2 time series data.

name: meteoForecast
one_line_profile: Access and process Numerical Weather Prediction model outputs
detailed_description: An R package to access, process, and analyze outputs from Numerical Weather Prediction models, supporting both raster formats and time series for specific locations.

name: gee-ccdc-tools
one_line_profile: Tools for interacting with CCDC algorithm outputs in Earth Engine
detailed_description: A suite of tools and Google Earth Engine (GEE) applications designed to visualize, interact with, and analyze the outputs of the Continuous Change Detection and Classification (CCDC) algorithm.

name: landtrendr-ccdc
one_line_profile: Comparison tool for LandTrendr and CCDC algorithms
detailed_description: A tool to compare the outputs of two major time-series change detection algorithms, LandTrendr and CCDC, for single Landsat pixels.

name: ccdciel
one_line_profile: CCD capture software for astronomy
detailed_description: A software tool for controlling CCD cameras and capturing astronomical images, designed for amateur astronomers.

name: Geospatial-Land-Use-Land-Cover-LULC-Classification-Using-Sentinel-2
one_line_profile: GEE-based workflow for land use/land cover classification and change detection
detailed_description: A Google Earth Engine (GEE) workflow implementing supervised classification methods (SVM/Random Forest) for Land Use Land Cover (LULC) mapping. It supports temporal analysis through change detection between years and the calculation of spectral indices like NDVI, NDBI, and MNDWI.

name: ChangeDetectionBaseline
one_line_profile: Deep learning baseline for change detection using Siamese CNNs
detailed_description: A baseline implementation for change detection in remote sensing imagery utilizing deep learning techniques, specifically Siamese Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs). It serves as a foundational model for comparing and developing change detection algorithms.

name: ChangeDetectionProject
one_line_profile: Active learning framework for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: An experimental project exploring the application of Active Learning combined with deep Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for change detection tasks in remote sensing data.

name: ukraine-damage-mapping-tool
one_line_profile: Tool for mapping war destruction using Sentinel-1 time series
detailed_description: An open-source tool designed to map war-related destruction at scale in Ukraine. It utilizes Sentinel-1 SAR time series data to detect structural changes and damage over large areas.

name: STS-CNN
one_line_profile: Unified Spatial-Temporal-Spectral Deep CNN for missing data reconstruction
detailed_description: Implementation of the STS-CNN model (IEEE TGRS 2018) for reconstructing missing data in remote sensing images. It employs a unified spatial-temporal-spectral deep convolutional neural network to recover information in cloud-contaminated or gap-filled imagery.

name: dtwSat
one_line_profile: Time-Weighted Dynamic Time Warping for satellite time series analysis
detailed_description: An R package providing an implementation of Time-Weighted Dynamic Time Warping (TWDTW) for analyzing satellite image time series. It is particularly useful for land cover classification and phenological monitoring using temporal patterns.

name: OpenLand
one_line_profile: Quantitative analysis and visualization of land use/cover change
detailed_description: An R package designed for the quantitative analysis and visualization of Land Use and Land Cover (LULC) changes. It provides tools to process raster data, calculate change metrics, and generate visualizations to understand landscape dynamics.

name: DSFANet
one_line_profile: Unsupervised Deep Slow Feature Analysis for change detection
detailed_description: Implementation of the DSFANet algorithm (IEEE TGRS 2019) for unsupervised change detection in multi-temporal remote sensing images. It utilizes Deep Slow Feature Analysis to extract invariant features and detect changes without requiring labeled training data.

name: RGISTools
one_line_profile: R package for downloading and processing satellite image time series
detailed_description: An R package designed to streamline the workflow of downloading, customizing, and processing time series of satellite imagery from major providers like Landsat, MODIS, and Sentinel. It facilitates the preparation of analysis-ready data for geospatial research.

name: dcvaVHROptical
one_line_profile: Deep Change Vector Analysis for VHR optical images
detailed_description: Implementation of Deep Change Vector Analysis (DCVA) for change detection in Very High Resolution (VHR) optical remote sensing images. It combines deep feature extraction with change vector analysis to identify changes in complex scenes.

name: SAR_CD_SAFNet
one_line_profile: Siamese Adaptive Fusion Network for SAR change detection
detailed_description: Code for the Siamese Adaptive Fusion Network (SAFNet) designed for change detection in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images (IEEE JSTARS 2021). It addresses the challenges of speckle noise and feature fusion in SAR data.

name: ClearSCD
one_line_profile: Semantic change detection model for high-resolution remote sensing imagery
detailed_description: A deep learning model designed to leverage semantics and change relationships for semantic change detection in high spatial resolution remote sensing imagery.

name: ELGC-Net
one_line_profile: Efficient Local-Global Context Aggregation network for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: A deep learning network (ELGC-Net) designed for efficient change detection in remote sensing images by aggregating local and global contexts.

name: rastercube
one_line_profile: Python library for big data analysis of georeferenced time series data
detailed_description: A library designed for efficient analysis of large-scale georeferenced time series data, such as MODIS NDVI, facilitating spatiotemporal data processing.

name: GAN-STFM
one_line_profile: Spatiotemporal fusion model for remote sensing images using GANs
detailed_description: A flexible spatiotemporal fusion model based on Conditional Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) to generate high spatiotemporal resolution remote sensing images.

name: WUP-CD
one_line_profile: Deep learning model for building change detection using 2.5D data
detailed_description: Implementation of the WUP-CD method for detecting building changes by utilizing 2.5D data (height information) alongside optical imagery.

name: BFast (JAX)
one_line_profile: Fast GPU-based bispectrum estimator implemented in JAX
detailed_description: A high-performance implementation of a bispectrum estimator using JAX for GPU acceleration, useful for higher-order statistical analysis in signal processing.

name: TESSERA
one_line_profile: Foundation model for time-series satellite imagery analysis
detailed_description: A foundation model developed for processing time-series satellite imagery, enabling applications such as land classification and canopy height prediction through temporal pattern extraction.

name: OpenCDA
one_line_profile: Framework for cooperative driving automation simulation
detailed_description: A generalized framework for prototyping full-stack cooperative driving automation applications, integrating CARLA and SUMO for realistic simulation.

name: Siamese-neural-network-for-change-detection
one_line_profile: Siamese neural network implementation for aerial image change detection
detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of a Siamese neural network specifically designed for detecting changes in aerial imagery.

name: TheroPoDa
one_line_profile: Toolkit for Sentinel-2 time-series analysis in Earth Engine
detailed_description: A toolkit for extraction, gap-filling, and trend analysis of Sentinel-2 time-series data using Google Earth Engine.

name: Simple-RS-Change-Detection-Framework
one_line_profile: Simplified PyTorch framework for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: A simplified and modular framework for implementing and testing various remote sensing change detection models using PyTorch.

name: CSA-CDGAN
one_line_profile: GAN-based framework for remote sensing change detection
detailed_description: A general framework utilizing Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for change detection in remote sensing images.

name: TransCD
one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for scene change detection
detailed_description: Implementation of a Transformer-based deep learning model designed for detecting changes in remote sensing scenes.

name: ChangeFormer
one_line_profile: Transformer-based Siamese network for change detection
detailed_description: A Transformer-based Siamese network architecture for efficient and accurate change detection in remote sensing imagery.

name: Metric-CD

name: Split Raster
